a-big-pink-dink.method: Pour rum over ice, fill with milk. Pour in a dash of grenadine to add a nice pink color.

a-bitter-canadian.method: Fill highball glass with ice. Add whiskey, then fill with sour mix. Finish with 2-3 dashes of Angostura bitters and a squeeze of a lemon wedge.

a-bomb.method: Build this drink over ice and stir.  Serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

a-day-at-the-beach.method: A definite beach drink!  Shake everything except your garnishes in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.  Strain into a highball glass half-full of cubed ice.  Serve with pineapple wedge and a strawberry as a garnish.

a-f-tini.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass. Garnish with a cherry.

a-kiss-goodnight.method: Add strawberry vodka and raspberry pucker, then fill half way with cranberry juice.  Fill the rest with 7-up and float a splash of dark rum on top.

a-kissed-buttery-nipple.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with 4 or 5 cubes of ice.  Pour the whole thing into a glass and add cherries.

a-night-at-naughty-nikkis.method: Place the skittles, or other fruity chewy candy in the bottom of a shot glass then pour 7-up and vodka.

a-piece-of-ass.method: Shake everything with ice and strain into shot glasses.

a-slippery-slide-through-a-muddy-chicken.method: Swirl Irish Cream, Kahlua and vodka gently in a cocktail shaker with ice to chill.  Strain into glass. Swiftly fill glass with cold Eggnog to mix. Serve with a smirk.

a-southern-screw.method: Pour SC and vodka over ice into a collins glass, and fill with orange juice.

a-splash-of-nash.method: Get yourself a shot glass and a highball glass. Fill the shot glass with half banana liqueur and half melon liqueur.  Put carbonated water and cranberry juice into the highball glass.  Drop the shot glass into the highball glass and drink fast!

a-walk-on-the-moon.method: Mix everything into a tall glass.  Serve with a straw.

abortion-shot.method: Add tobasco sauce to shot glass enough to fill bottom, also line the lip of the glass. Pour Vodka in. Do not smell the shot, just drink and enjoy.

abrupt-realization.method: Pour into glass, stir and enjoy.

absinthe-shot.method: Use two separate glasses at first.  Add 7-up to one, absinthe to the other.  Light absinthe on fire, wait for 5 seconds, then pour it into 7-up glass.  Be extremely careful while pouring!  Set absinthe cup upside down with a straw underneath the edge and inhale through the straw. Then take the shot.

absolut-asshole.method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice, shake, and strain into a double shot glass. Should be well chilled before serving.

absolut-blue-lemonade.method:
Shake and serve on ice.
Usually made with Absolut brand vodka.

absolut-lemonade.method: Pour all ingredients into a pint glass filled with ice.

absolut-royal-fuck.method: Pour vodka, whiskey, peach schnapps, and cranberry into a mixing tin with ice. Shake once and pour into collins glass.

absolut-sex.method: Shake everything but 7-up in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass and add a splash of 7-up on top.  Damn you're lookin' good today...

absolut-stress.method: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake thoroughly. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

absolut-sunrise.method: Put ice in glass.  Add vodka.  Fill with orange juice.  Stir.  Slowly add the grenadine, it will settle to the bottom.

absolutly-horny.method: Build over a glass of ice. Stir and enjoy.

adios-motherfucker.method: Pour all the ingredients except the club soda into chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Top with soda. Stir gently.

adios-motherfucker-151.method: Combine all ingredients except 151 rum in a collins glass with ice.  Float 151 on top and ignite.  Put it out after 5-10 seconds and serve without stirring.

adult-hot-chocolate.method: Warm your mug first, it makes the drink stay warmer longer.  Put the schnapps into your mug, and fill it with hot chocolate.  Top with whipped cream, and chocolate shavings are good too!

after-eight.method: Tastes like an After Eight chocolate mint!  Layer into a shot glass in the following order:  Kahlua, white Creme de Menthe, Bailey's.

after-five.method: Layer Kahlua, Peppermint schnapps and Baileys into a shot glass.

afterwhile-crocodile.method: Add ingredients to blender.  Blend until smooth.  Garnish with wedge of lime.

agent-orange.method: You'd better be using a large hurricane glass for this one.  Put everything into a shaker half-full of ice and shake.  Pour into hurricane glass, and garnish with a wedge of orange and/or a cherry.

airhead.method: Make sure your cranberry juice is cold.  Put schnapps in first and top with cranberry juice.  Shoot.

alabama-slammer.method: Pour Amaretto, sloe gin and Southern Comfort into a highball glass with ice.  Add lemon juice last, and serve.

alabama-slammer-2.method: Shake everything with ice in a cocktail shaker, and strain into shot glasses.  Use as much orange juice as desired.

alabama-slammer-3.method: Mix liquor in a shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass with ice. Fill with orange juice. Garnish with a flag (orange slice and cherries).

alabama-slammer-4.method: Mix all ingredients into glass.  Pour over ice.

alawai-canal.method: Build over ice, stir, and enjoy.

algae-2.method: Fill cup with ice and add 2 shots of vodka, 3 shots of Hawaiian Punch, and 1 shot Dr. Pepper. Stir.

algonquin-bloody-mary.method: Throw everything but the lime into a shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into a highball glass.  Add lime wedge.

alice-in-wonderland.method: Use an old fashioned glass, and add one part Amaretto, one part Grand Marnier, one part Southern Comfort.

alien-nipple.method: Another in the line of 'nipple shooters'.  Put Butterscotch Schnapps into a shot glass, followed by Bailey's.  Top with melon and shoot.

alien-secretion.method: Add ingredients into mixing tin with ice, stir, then pour into shot glasses.

alligator-1.method: Build over ice in a cocktail glass.

alligator-bite.method: Shake vodka, Midori and orange juice in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into the bottom of a shot or martini glass. Layer in the Chambord, which will sink to the bottom, and float Jagermeister on top.

almond-joy-martini.method: Pour over ice in shaker.  Give a generous splash of Frangelico.  Shake hard. Serve up in a chilled martini glass.  Garnish with shaved coconut if desired.

aloha-screwdriver.method: Combine ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.  Use the orange juice and pineapple juice to fill in a 1:2 ratio.

alpine-sprite.method: Toss one and a half oz. of peppermint schnapps into a highball glass and fill with Sprite.  Tastes like.....Mentos.

amaretto-freeze.method: Blend vanilla ice cream and amaretto in a blender until smooth.  Pour into cocktail glass and add a cherry on top!

amaretto-pie.method: Pour all ingredients into a mixer, shake then strain into several shot glasses.

amaretto-rose.method: Put ice in a collins glass and add Amaretto and lime juice.  Add soda and stir.

amaretto-sour.method: It takes a bit of skill to make a truly good Amaretto Sour.  First of all, use fresh lemon juice whenever possible, and use a chilled sour glass as well.  Rub the rim of your glass with a lemon slice, and dip it in bar sugar until the rim is well frosted.  Shake amaretto and lemon juice in a shaker, then strain into sour glass.  Garnish with an orange slice or maraschino cherry, and enjoy!

amaretto-spritzer.method: Take glass full of ice and add 3 oz. Amaretto.  Fill with 7-up or sprite.  Add a cherry for apperance.  Mix.  Yum Yum!

amaretto-stone-sour.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake well and strain into a sour glass.

amaretto-sunrise.method: Put amaretto and orange juice into a highball glass.  Put the grenadine in around the sides of the glass using a spoon.  Serve.

amaretto-tea.method: Pour hot tea into an Irish coffee glass.   Add the amaretto slowly, without stirring, and top with chilled whipped cream.  Serve quickly.

american-flag.method: This is a layered shot, with the end result being a layer of red, then white and blue.  Fill the shot 1/3 of the way with grenadine.  Using the back of a spoon (bar spoon if you have one), pour in the white creme de cacao.  Use the same technique to fill the final 1/3 with blue curacao.  Enjoy the effect.

amermans-specialty.method: Put 1 to 2 shots of Malibu Coconut Rum in a glass.  Add crushed ice and fill the glass with pineapple juice.

amor-de-cosmos.method: Fill a cocktail shaker 1/3 full of ice, and add whiskey, cranberry juice and grenadine.  Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.  Top off with a splash of carbonated water and a splash of ginger ale.  Put a cherry in the middle

anal-sex.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a white wine glass half filled with ice.

annas-banana.method: Fill blender with 4 oz ice.  Add Vodka, lime juice, banana slices and honey.  Blend at medium speed for about 15 seconds, until smooth.  Pour in chilled wine glass.  Garnish with slice of lime.

annexation-of-peurto-rico.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

antifreeze.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain over ice cubes in a highball glass.  Garnish with a cherry.

antifreeze-3.method: Pour Everclear into pitcher. Mix in packet of Lime Kool-Aid. Mix in a 2-litre of Mountain Dew, stir. Serve in Collins glass or beer mug over ice.

apple-cider-surprise.method: First pour in the ginger ale, then pour in the apple juice, then pour in the vodka. Give it a good stir or shake (which ever you prefer).

apple-fairy.method:
For this recipe, make some apple juice ice cubes before you start.  Then add 3 apple juice cubes to a cocktail glass.  Add absinthe and apple vodka, and fill with cider.  Enjoy the fairy.
Add the cubes, then the absinthe and the applevodka - fill with cider, enjoy the fairy...

apple-jack.method: Combine ingredients and pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

apple-jolly-rancher.method: Shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker.  Strain into a rocks glass, no ice.

apple-judy.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice.  Strain into cocktail glass.

apple-martini.method: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.  Garnish with an apple slice.

apple-martini-2.method: Shake ingredients together and strain into cocktail glass.

apple-pie-4.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on top.

apple-pie-bulk.method: Mix apple juice, apple cider, sugar, and cinnamon sticks together. Boil until cinnamon sticks lose flavor. Add Everclear. Refrigerate.

apple-pie-with-a-crust.method: You can make this a shot, or a regular drink, it's great both ways.  1 part coconut rum and 3 parts apple juice in a shot or collins glass.  Top with a pinch of cinammon.

applepuckertini.method: Build over ice in a collins glass.

appletini.method: Chill the glass. Mix liquors in a shaker with ice. Put a cherry in the bottom of the glass. Strain and serve. It is even tasty to rim the glass with crumbled graham crackers for an apple pie effect.

apricot-babe.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

apricot-cocktail.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.  Use chilled orange juice, and make sure you shake well.

ariane-special.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

arizona-antifreeze.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

aruba-rum-punch.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice, and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

ass-candy.method: Fill your glass with ice and add Amaretto.  SLOWLY pour the Cherry cola over the top and give it a quick stir.

ass-on-flames.method: First layer the ingredients starting with the Amaretto, then Sour Apple Pucker, and Southern Comfort. Next float the 151 Rum, light it on fire and shoot the drink.

asshole-boyfriend.method: Fill cup with ice. Add one shot of vodka, two shots of ginger ale, one shot of Red Bull, and a splash of cranberry juice.

at-deaths-door.method:
Add all ingredients except sugar cubes and bourbon into a chilled pitcher and mix. Add the ice last. 
To finish, take the four sugar cubes and melt them together to form one large cube.  Take the table spoon of bourbon and pour it onto the sugar cube, light it and set it on top of the ice in the pitcher.

at-t.method:
Build over ice in a rocks glass.  Add tonic water last.  Stir.

Usually London Tanqueray brand gin is used in this recipe.

auburn-headbanger.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

aztec-punch.method: Combine ingredients in a punch bowl.   Serve in tumblers.

b-52.method: Layer Kahlua, Bailey's and then Grand Marnier in a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

b-52-2.method: Layer Kahlua, then Amaretto, then Baileys into a shot glass.

b-52-3.method: Layer Kahlua, then Baileys and finally Cointreau in a shot glass.

b-52-4.method: Layer Baileys, then Tia Maria followed by Absinthe.  Light the shot on fire and serve!

b-52-7.method:
Layer equal parts of Kahlua, Bailey's and then Grand Marnier in a shot glass. Pour Coke into glass then drop in the shot. Shoot the whole thing.

| Garret "Rookie" | Timmy "Angus" | DJ | Luke |

b-52-original.method:
Layer Kahlua, then Bailey's, then Cointreau in a shot glass.  Light the Cointreau on fire, and put a straw though to the bottom of the glass and drink all at once though the straw.  Now keep for about 10 seconds in your mouth.  Then swallow the drink and inhale though your mouth.
Drink the last bit for a nice after touch.

b-57.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into shot glasses.

b-69.method: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into an old-fashioned glass.

b52.method: Layer Kahlua, Bailey's and then Grand Marnier in a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

baby-eskimo.method: Add Kahlua and milk to glass, then put in two scoops of ice cream.  It helps to let the ice cream soften a bit.  Stir.

baby-guinness.method: Fill a shot glass almost full with Kahlua.  Layer Irish cream on top.  Mini-Guinness!

babymama.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass on the rocks.

babymama-drama.method: Mix 99 bananas, pineapple juice, and Stoli with ice. Strain into test tube, float 151.

backfire.method: In a shot glass, layer Kahlua, then Irish cream, then vodka.  Serve.

backseat-boogie.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Add gin and vodka first, then fill with half cranberry juice, half ginger ale.

bad-habit.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

bahama-mama.method: Put a dash of grenadine on the bottom of the glass.  Fill with cracked ice and add ingredients.  Stir very gently before serving.

bahamian-goombay-smash.method: Shake well. Serve in Hurricane glass w/cracked ice, a cherry and a sliced lemon on top of glass.

bailey-martini.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

baileyfloat.method: Use a chilled beer mug.  Add Irish cream and fill with root beer.

baileys-banana-vanilla-thrilla.method:
--(1 cup coconut milk can replace 1 cup milk)--

Simple Recipe, just add all liquids in blender with banana and ice cream; blending until smooth.  Add ice and sugar, and pulse until a smoothie consistency is reached.  Garnish with coconut.  Makes 2-3 500mL servings.  For a fancier garnish, use the head of a tropical flower.

baileys-comet.method:
Shake the Irish Cream, Butterscotch Schnapps and Goldschlager with ice in a cocktail shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.  Put a shallow layer of 151-proof rum on top.  Light the rum on fire, then immediately sprinkle a generous dash of cinammon on top.  The cinnammon will sparkle and flame.

Don't let it burn too long, or the irish cream will curdle!

baileys-dream-shake.method: Blend ingredients in a blender until smooth.

baileys-float-2.method: Pour Bailey's 3/4 of the way into a glass, then carefully fill the rest of the way with root beer.

baileys-hot-shot.method: Put the Irish cream into a large glass (not a shot glass), and microwave it until it's hot (maybe 30 seconds on high power).  Sugar the rims of your shot glasses, and pour the hot Bailey's in.  Serve.

baileys-white-russian.method: Combine ingredients in a rocks glass.

bambus.method: Mix ingredients in a red wine glass.

banana-banshee.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and serve in a cocktail glass.

banana-cow.method: Shake rum, creme de banana, cream, and grenadine with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a banana slice and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

banana-cream-pie.method: Fill a highball glass with ice, crushed or cubed, your choice.  Add all ingredients and stir.

banana-hammock.method: Chill ingredients.  Shake everything except curacao in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.  Carefully add chilled blue curacao.  Garnish with 2 cherries.

banana-nut.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

banging-the-captain-3-ways-on-the-comfor.method: Fill glass with ice. Add 1 oz. Southern Comfort and 1 oz. Captain Morgan. Fill with equal parts of Pineapple Juice, Cranberry Juice, and Orange Juice.

banshee.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and serve in a cocktail glass.

bar-slut.method: Add vodka to a mason jar filled with ice.  Add cranberry juice and Red Bull and splash 7-up on top.  Stir and enjoy!

bare-cheeks.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into cocktail glass.

bartenders-wet-dream.method: Mix ingredients in a shot glass and top with a puff of whipped cream.

bay-breeze.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

bazooka-bull.method: Pour them both over ice. Tastes just like Bazooka Joe Bubble Gum!

bazooka-joe.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.  Shake and strain into a shot glass.  You can make multiple shots all at once, just keep the ratio of ingredients to 1 part each.

bazooka-joe-2.method: In a plastic cup add an ounce and a half of Bacardi Limon, then a half a can of Red Bull, and then finish with a splash of grenadine!

beautiful.method: Combine ingredients in a brandy snifter.

beaver-shot.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

beergarita.method: Stir together Frozen lime concentrate, beer, ice, and tequila in a pitcher.  Pour into a salt rimmed glass.  Garnish with lime wedge.

belfast-car-bomb.method: Fill shot glass with 1/2 oz. of whiskey and the other half with Bailey's Irish cream. Then drop the shot glass into a pint of Guinness and chug.

belgian-blue.method: COmbine ingredients in a highball glass.

bermuda-triangle.method: Pour ingredients into ice filled old-fashioned glass.

big-dumb-animal-bda.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

big-easy-martini.method: Combine ingredients with ice in a shaker. Shake well. Strain into chilled, sugar-rimmed martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

big-skyy.method: Put slices of lemon and lime into glass. Pour in rum, and then vodka. Add a little crushed ice. Next fill the cup up with Sprite. Stir.

bit-o-honey.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

bitch-ass.method: Add rum and vodka to a hurricane glass full of ice.  Fill with desired amount of pineapple and orange juice, topping with a splash of cranberry.  Squeeze a lime wedge over it and then drop it in.

bitch-slap.method: Shake everything with ice and pour into a collins glass with ice.  Garnish with a lemon wedge.

black-anaconda.method: Chill all three ingredients. Mix in shaker and pour into frosted mason jar.

black-cat.method: Stir everything together with ice.  Garnish with a mandarin orange slice if available.

black-death.method: Shake all ingredient except orange juice in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into collins glass over ice and fill with orange juice.

black-gold.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

black-magic-cream.method: Layer ingredients in a shot glass.

black-majic.method: Build over ice in a collins glass.

black-opal.method: Fill pint glass with ice.  Add all liquors and sour mix.  Shake and return to pint glass.  Top with 7-up.

black-russian.method: Build over ice in a rocks glass.

black-santa.method: Pour the vodka and Kahlua coffee liqueur into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes. Add the peppermint schnapps and serve.

black-tooth-grin.method: Pour the Crown Royal into a shot glass, then add just enough cola to turn it black.

black-widow.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

blacktooth.method: Pour the Crown Royal into a shot glass, then add just enough cola to turn it black.

blended-heaven.method: Blend ingredients in a blender.  It will make several drinks, enjoy.

blonde-bimbo.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

bloodbath.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker.  Strain into red wine glass.

bloody-brain.method: Shake grenadine and strawberry schnapps in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.  Carefully add Bailey's into the middle of the glass.  If done right, it will form a blob on the bottom.  Braaaaaaains...

bloody-ceasar.method: Rim glass useing lime & celery salt. Fill glass 1/3 with ice, add vodka, clamato and a splash each of worcestershire sauce and tabasco. Add a dash of celery salt and pepper, garnish with lime & celery.

bloody-mary.method: Add dashes of salt and pepper, Tabasco and Worcestershire to a highball glass, then add other ingredients. Stir gently. Garnish with a celery stalk and a lemon wedge.

bloody-smurf.method: Add the Gin, Rum, Lemonade, and Blue Curacao into the shaker with ice. Sugar the rim (important!) of the highball glass and add 4 ice cubes. Shake mix and strain into glass. Add grenadine slowly over the ice cubes to create the effect of a smurf in a blender.

blow-job.method: This drink is strictly for the ladies!  Combine Kahlua and Bailey's in a shot glass, and top with a puff of whipped cream.  It must be shot without using your hands!

blue-ghost.method:
Add everything into a shaker and shake vigorously. To make colder and thicker 1 scoop of vanilla ice cream can be substituted for the cream. This makes about 10 shots (?).
Smirnoff 100 proof vodka and Captain Morgan brand rum are preferred for this recipe.

blue-hawaiian.method: Add all ingredients (except garnishes) to a blender and blend at high speed.  Pour into a highball glass and garnish with the pineapple slice and a cherry.

blue-ice-2.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

blue-lagoon.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

blue-long-island.method: Typical long island with a kick. Pour into Collins glass on ice. Liquors first followed by sour mix and then blue curacao to preferance. Straw and garnish with a lemon.

blue-margarita.method: Salt the rim of a cocktail glass using lime juice and bar salt.  Add ingredients to cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into salted glass.

blue-monday.method: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

blue-mother-fucker.method: Pour liquors into a glass with ice. Add a splash of sour mix and a splash of 7-up. Give one or two shakes and serve.

blue-motorcycle.method: Mix all ingredients then fill with 7-up....

blue-punch.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

blue-razzberry-kamikaze.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glass.

blue-shark.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

blue-tap.method: Shake tequila and pineapple juice with ice.  Pour into a highball glass filled with ice and pour the curacao into the center of the drink.

blueberry-tea.method: Combine ingredients in a tea or coffee mug.  Earl grey tea is good with this recipe!

bob-dylan.method: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

bob-marley.method:
The true Bob Marley is grenadine at the bottom, creme de menthe in the middle, and 151 plus creme de bananna, so it makes the red, green and yellow of the Jamaican flag. Light it on fire, stick a straw down to the bottom and finish it!

You heard it here first.

boccie-ball.method: Measure a highball glass full of ice into a cocktail shaker.  Add ingredients and shake.  Pour back into glass.

body-bag.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

body-shot.method: Get your (willing) partner and get set for some fun.  Lick their neck and pour on some sugar.  Put a lemon wedge in their mouth (peel inward).  Get a shot of vodka ready.  Lick the sugar off their neck, shoot the vodka and then suck the lemon from their mouth.  Mmm mmm!

bone-crusher.method: Shake everything except champagne in a shaker with ice.  Pour into glass and drop in the champagne.

bongo.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker (no ice).  Pour into a highball glass.

booty-clap.method: Pour ingredients into any glass of your choice.  Drink with or without ice - it is suggested that the best experience is without ice.

botched-abortion.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

bottle-cap.method: Pour Schnapps and Raspberry Sour Puss in shot glass.  Pour 1/2 glass of lime juice in a short glass.  Drop the shot glass into the other glass and slam it back.

brain-eraser.method: Build over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

brain-tumor.method: Add peach schnapps to a shot glass.  Slowly add Irish cream.  Don't mix... the cream will clump together and settle to the bottom. It will look gross. Pour the grenadine over the cream lump for a completely disgusting looking, but really tasty Halloween party drink.

brandy-alexander.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and sprinkle with a pinch of nutmeg.

brandy-manhattan.method: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

brass-monkey.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

brazen-hussy.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

bride-to-be-2.method:
Pour a splash of vanilla vodka into champagne flute. Next add 1 oz. strawberry schapps. Fill glass with Sprite. Add as little red food coloring as possible, and stir slowly. Drink should be light pink and bubbly. Perfect for bachelorette parties!

*Note: a colored schnapp (Strawberry Pucker, for example) could be used, but has been found to overwhelm the vanilla taste and makes the drink a less appealing reddish color.

british-snakebite.method: Mix or layer ingredients. Note - the mixture of beer and cider is so effective at making you drunk its illegal to serve Snakebite in pubs and bars in Britain!

broken-down-golf-cart.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

broken-down-golf-cart-2.method: Layer ingredients in a shot glass.

brooklyn-hippie.method: Fill glass with ice, pour vodka then add Mountain Dew. Stir with a spoon.

brown-bomber.method: Add to glass with several ice cubes, and then sip or chug as you please.

brush-fire.method: Pour 1/3 oz. tabasco sauce into a shot glass. Fill the rest of the shot glass with cinnamon schnapps and serve.

bubble-gum-3.method: Put banana liqueur in a shot glass and set off to one side. Put grenadine in bottom of a glass, then pour in the Red Bull. Drop shot into glass and chug.

buffalo-milk.method:
Fill a tall glass with ice. Blend ice with cream, banana and alcohol until smooth. Top with whipped cream, sprinkle with nutmeg, serve and enjoy.

A local favorite on Catalina island.

bulge-in-my-pants.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

bull-blaster.method: Shoot the Jagermeister and chase with Red Bull.

bull-piss.method: Pour them both over ice. Tastes just like Bazooka Joe Bubble Gum!

burning-africa.method: In a shot glass add Jagermeister first then layer 151 on top. Then set on fire. Count to five.

burning-nazi.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

butt-naked.method: Mix Ammaretto, Southern Comfort, and cranberry juice.  Garnish w/ Maraschino Cherry and Lime.

butter-pecan-martini.method: Pour contents into shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into cocktail glass.

butterbee.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

butterfinger.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Drink with a straw.

butterscotch-martini.method: Combine Butterscotch Schnapps and Vanilla Vodka in a shaker half filled with ice cubes.  Strain into a Cocktail glass.

buttery-crown.method: Pour Crown Royal into shot glass first, then layer schnapps on top.

buttery-nipple.method: Layer Irish cream on top of the schnapps in a shot glass.

buttery-nipple-2.method: Layer Irish cream on top of peach schnapps in a shot glass.

buttery-nipple-cocktail.method: Fill the glass with ice, slowly pour about 3 oz. of Bailey's and then a splash of butterscotch Schnapps for the finishing touch. Stir with your straw and enjoy!!! I know you will!

buttery-nipple-with-a-cherry-kiss.method: Layer Irish cream on top of the butterscotch schnapps in a shot glass.  Put a cherry on a spoon and carefully pour cherry liqueur over it into the shot glass.  Do the shot and eat the cherry!

buttery-nipples-3.method: Place all four ingredients and ice into a shaker and shake like crazy!!  Strain into shot glasses.  OR.....  Place the first three ingredients into a shaker, shake.  Pour into a glass of your choice, top with ice and cranberry juice.

cabo.method: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

cadillac-margarita.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a salt-rimmed coupe glass.  Garnish with a lime wedge.

caesar.method: Rim a highball glass with salt and pepper or bar salt.  Add a bit of ice, then add vodka.  Fill with clamato juice and add tabasco and worcestershire.  Garnish with a stick of celery, a green bean, or a stalk of asparagus.

caged-animal.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

caipirinha.method: Muddle the sugar with the lime wedges in a rocks glass.  Fill glass with ice and add Cachaca.  Stir well.

caipiroska.method: Muddle a lime slice and sugar in a highball glass.  Add vodka.  Fill glass with crushed ice and stir well.

cajun-bloody-mary.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Garnish with a celery stick, or a hot pepper!

cake-mix.method: Fill glass with ice. Add vanilla vodka with 3 parts ginger ale.

california-gold-rush.method: Combine ingredients in a collins glass.  Mix well so the gold flakes are distributed, and don't use ice.

california-root-beer.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

canada-dream.method: Shake everything with ice and pour into a highball glass with ice.

canadian-car-bomb.method: Pour beer into a glass, drop the shot of whiskey into the glass and chug-a-lug! It's only for the strongest of men and any true Canadian. Let's get smashed, eh?!

canadian-cocktail.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

canadian-zombie.method: Fill a collins glass about half way with ice.  Add white and dark rums, then fill with equal portions of lemon and orange juice.  Add grenadine and curacao slowly around the top near the rim of the glass.  Float the 151-proof rum on top and serve.

candy-apple-3.method: Add apple pucker and Crown Royal to a shot glass, then add a splash of cranberry juice on top.

candy-cane.method: Fill a highball glass with ice and add liquers and grenadine.  Stir, then fill with cream.  Top with 7-up and garnish with a candy cane.

candy-cane-tini.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.  Place a candy cane in the glass.  It will turn the drink pink and adds to the flavor.

cantaloupe-dizzy.method: Add carbonated water to a parfait glass with ice.  Shake remaining ingredients in a cocktail shaker and strain into the glass.  Stir and garnish with a cherry.

cape-cod-crush.method: Combine ingredients in a blender.  Blend and add ice until desired consistency is reached.  Serve in a mason jar.

cape-codder.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Garnish with a lime wedge.

captain-and-taneal.method: Pour rum over ice, and add the iced tea. A slice of lemon make a nice touch.

captain-cook.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

captain-jack-sparrow.method: Pour shots into glass. Fill with cola and stir.

captain-louie.method:
An interestingly flavored shot. Mix the ingredients in the following order: rum, drop of vanilla extract, Kahlua, drop of vanilla extract.

Generally made with Captain Morgan's brand spiced rum.

captain-n-coke.method: Add ice and cola to the cup. Next, add Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum with the lime slices. Stir, add straw, enjoy.

captain-pepper.method:
Build over ice in a highball glass.

Generally made with Captain Morgan's brand spiced rum.

car-bomb.method: Combine Irish cream and whiskey in a shot glass.  Drop shot into a glass of Guinness and drink quickly.

caramel-apple-martini.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

caramel-apple-martini-2.method: Use the caramel syrup to coat the rim of a martini glass.  Shake the rest of the ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker an strain into glass.  Drop in a cherry.

caribbean-blues.method:
Fill a cocktail glass with cracked ice, and add the vodka and vermouth. (Alternatively, swish the glass with vermouth beforehand, discarding any extra).  Slowly add the Curacao to the top, allowing it to "float" down through the mixture. 
Serve with a cocktail umbrella if handy.

caribbean-kiss.method: Moisten the rim of a cocktail glass with Kahlua, then dip it in brown sugar.  Shake amaretto, Kahlua, rum and cream in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into the glass.  Add a sprinkle of cinammon on top.

caribou-lou.method: Mix all together in the glass.

carmel-apple-shot.method: Mix directly into shot glass.  Prepare for an enjoyably smooth aftertaste.

carparinha.method: Begin by squashing the 8 slices of lime in a short glass, add sugar and some leaves of mint (for fresh taste), muddle until the sugar is mixed with the lime juice.  Fill the rest of the glass with crushed ice and add the Cachaca and lime juice.

carrot-cake.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker.  Shake well and pour (do not strain) into shot glasses.

carrot-cake-2.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a large shot glass.

caucasian.method: Add vodka and Kahlua to a rocks glass over ice.  Fill with desired amount of cream.

cement-mixer.method: Pour a shot of Bailey's and a shot of lime juice.  Shoot both shots but do not swallow.  Instead, mix them around in your mouth.  It will start to solidify!

chambord-margarita-2.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

champagne-punch.method: Combine all the spirits (but not the champagne) in a punch bowl and chill for at least an hour.  Before serving, add the champagne, ginger ale, and carbonated water.  Put a nice ice sculpture in the middle.

charm-city-classic.method: First, mix the Iced tea and the Lemonade in a separate glass. Add the grand marnier to a second collins glass. Then, pour the mixed contents of the Iced Tea-Lemonade into the glass with the Grand Marnier. Stir and drink.

charro-negro.method: Salt the rim of a cocktail glass using lemon juice.  Put in three cubes of ice and add tequila.  Squeeze in fresh lemon juice, fill with cola and stir.

cheese-cake.method: Put half a shot glass of chilled schnapps into glass, add cranberry juice slowly so that the two don't mix.

cherry-bomb-2.method: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice. Shake and strain into shot glass.

cherry-bomb-3.method: Add 1/2 a can of Red Bull to a glass.  Drop in a shot of cherry vodka.

chi-chi.method: Chill a highball glass.  Blend rum, pineapple juice, cream of coconut and ice in a bar blender.  Pour into the chilled glass over ice cubes.  Layer the brandy on top, and top with whipped cream.  Garnish with a slice of pineapple.

china-white.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

chocolate-cake.method: Combine Frangelico and Grand Marnier in a shot glass.  Put a dash of pepper on your hand. Lick the pepper, drink the shot and immediately suck the lime.  Taste just like chocolate cake!

chocolate-cake-2.method: Chill vodka and Frangelico in mixing glass with ice. Pour into shot glass.  Moisten hand and sprinkle sugar onto it, drink the shot, lick the sugar and suck the lemon.

chocolate-cake-3.method: Shake Frangelico and vanilla vodka in a cocktail shaker.  Pour into a shot glass. Put a pinch of sugar on the lemon wedge. Eat the wedge and drink the shot.

chocolate-covered-cherry-2.method: Layer Kahlua over Bailey's over grenadine.

chocolate-covered-cherry-jello-shots.method: Mix cherry jello with the hot water until dissolved. Add the Godiva and vodka then pour into 2 oz cups and chill.  For best results, chill the Godiva and Vodka prior to use.

chocolate-covered-cherry-shot.method: Shake all ingredients except grenadine in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a shot glass and add a drop of grenadine to the center.

chocolate-death.method: Layer chocolate vodka on bottom, then creme de cacao, and finally chocolate liqueur last.  Look and enjoy!

chocolate-drpepper.method: Combine ingredients in a collins glass.  Stir.

chocolate-heart.method: Add a few ice cubes to a highball glass.  Pour in Frangelico and Kahlua, then drop in a maraschino cherry (remove the stem).  Pour the cream down the sides of the glass and stir lightly before serving.

chocolate-heaven.method: Pour Kahlua into shot glass, then carefully layer Bailey's and Chocolate Liqueur on top.  Drizzle with caramel syrup and enjoy.

chocolate-kiss.method: Pour liquid ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake, strain into Martini glass. Drop in Hershy's kiss and serve. (For added flair, ahead of time dip rims of chilled martini glasses into melted bittersweet chocolate and chill until set.)

chocolate-lovers-martini.method: Take a martini glass and squeeze in chocolate syrup. Mix all alcohol ingredients in a shaker and pour into glass. Drop a Hershey's Kiss on top.

chocolate-martini.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

chocolate-mountain.method: Shake all ingredients except Kahlua in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass and add the Kahlua to the center.

chocolate-snow-bear.method: Blend ingredients in a bar blender at low speed until smooth.  Serve in a chilled champagne flute.

chocolatey-orange-sunset.method: Pour Sunny D into a cocktail glass, then pour in the shot of Kahlua.  Let settle at bottom, and sit back and look at the fine mix of brown and orange.

christmas-in-a-cup.method: Add Dr.Pepper and spiced rum, stir, then put Aftershock in and let it mix by itself.

christmas-in-mexico.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.  Garnish with cranberries and slice of lime (salt optional).

chuck-norris.method: Fill shot glass with UV Red and put into the center of a larger glass. Pour Liquid Ice into glass around the shot glass until it's up to the top of shot glass.

ciclonic-hurricane.method: Put ice into glass.  Pour Ciclon, Gin and Amaretto over ice.  Splash grenadine on top of that.  Then pour in the juices.  Stir thouroughly.  Drink very quickly with a straw.

cindys-orchid.method: Pour Baja Rosa in bottom of shot glass, carefully float melon liqueur on top.

cinnamon-roll.method: Start with the Irish Cream and fill the glass a little over half full. Then top it off with the schnapps (Hot Damn brand preferred for this recipe).

classic-amaretto-sour.method: Put a few ice cubes in glass.  Pour Amaretto over ice, then pour sour mix on top.  Stir and enjoy.

clear-lemonade.method: Fill glass with ice.  Then add everclear.  Last the lemonade.  Best when shaken and not stirred.  Gets a better taste to it. Watch out though it sneaks up on you.

climax.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice.  Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocaine-cocktail.method: Fill blender with ice, pour all ingredients in blender, add cream, blend again and serve in tall glass.

cocito.method: Mix coconut milk, sweetened condensed milk, cream of coconut, cinnamon, nutmeg, and eggnog in blender and blend for 1 minute. Slowly pour in coconut rum and mix until desired strength.

cock-sucking-cowboy.method:
Pour schnapps into shot glass, then layer the Bailey's on top.
Enjoy. Great for those cold winter nights out on the town. The more you drink the better you feel.

cockit.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.  Yell "Cockit!" right before downing a shot.

coco-loco.method: Pour Bacardi Coco Rum over ice in a highball glass.  Add 2 squirts of lime juice and fill with cola.

coconut-cola.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

cokaretto.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

cola-meister.method: 2 shots of Jagermeister in the glass, than fill up with cola.

colorado-bulldog.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

concrete.method: Put a shot of vodka in your mouth, then add a shot of Irish cream.  Mix it up and swallow.

cookie-dough.method: Add Irish cream to a shot glass, and sprinkle cinnamon on top.  Layer amarettor on top of this, and add another sprinkle of cinnamon.  Allow cinnamon to begin to settle, then serve.

cookie-monster.method: Layer Kahlua, then Irish cream in a shot glass.  Add 151 rum on top and ignite.  Blow out after a few seconds and drink with a straw.

copper-camel.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

coquito.method: Add cinnamon sticks to water and boil until water is yellow.  Add evaporated milk, condensed milk and yolks and cook at low temperature.  Stir occasionally.  Once it has boiled for a few minutes, add rum and cream of coconut.  Stir, remove from heat and cool.  Store in refridgerator.

corn-fed-country-pussy.method: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

cosmopolitan.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lime slice.

cosmopolitan-3.method: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

cowboy-kool-aid.method:
Take a clean, empty, plastic gallon jug.  Pour in the smallest can of frozen limeade you can find, about 6 oz.  Add all six cans of ice-cold Mountain Dew.  Pour the entire pint of 190 proof Everclear into the jug.  Add enough cold water to bring the brew close to the top of the jug (about a cup or so.)  Now shake it very, very gently with the lid on the jug.  It'll fizz, so don't shake it hard!  

Pour into mason jars (or sip right from the jug if you're so inclined) and enjoy.

cowboy-up.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

crackhouse.method: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into shot glasses.

cranberry-pineapple-vodka-punch.method: Chill ingredients, and then combine in a punch bowl with a block of ice, and add pineapple spears.  Serve in cups.

creamsicle-dream.method: You can make this drink as a float by pouring the rum and OJ into a glass and stirring, then adding a scoop of ice cream.  You can also mix it all up in a blender if you'd like.  It's great either way!

creamy-grasshopper.method: Blend ingredients in a bar blender until smooth.  Serve in a hurricane glass.

creamy-sex-on-the-beach.method: Mix everything except whipped cream in shaker. Add whipped cream and shake vigorously until frothy. Serve as a shot, or over ice in a highball glass.

crocodile.method: Fill a highball glass with ice.  Add rum and melon liqueur, fill with soda.

crowning-of-the-bull.method: Fill glass with ice and equal amounts of Crown and Red Bull.

crunk-juice.method: Pour 1 can of CRUNK!!! Energy drink into a highball glass with ice.  Add an ounce of Cognac, preferably Henessey.

crunk-juice-2.method:
Pour 1 can of Red Bull Energy drink into High Ball Glass. Add 1/2 oz. of Hypnotiq.

(Editor note:  This is not the real recipe for Crunk Juice.  The real recipe requires CRUNK!!! brand energy drink.  This version of the recipe has been popularized by various bars and nightclubs, but is not the real thing.)

crystal-virgin.method: Mix everything together and serve chilled in shot glasses.

cuba-libre.method: Fill a tall glass with ice and add the rum.  Add a few drops of lime or lemon juice and fill the glass with cola. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cucumber-martini.method: Muddle mint and a cucumber slice in a cocktail shaker.  Add other ingredients and ice.  Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass, and garnish with a slice of cucumber and a fresh mint sprig.

cucumber-mint-martini.method: First: bring water, sugar, and mint to a boil. Let cool. Shake 1.5 oz. vodka, 1/4 oz. fresh lemon juice, 1 oz. cucumber juice and 1/2 oz. of the mint syrup in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

cum-in-a-hot-tub.method: Combine blue curacao and peach schnapps and shake in mixing tin with ice.  Pour into shot glass.  Pour small amount of irish cream over top.

cum-shots.method: Combine 7-up and vodka in a punch bowl.  Add sherbet

daiquiri.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

damn-the-weather.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into rocks glass.

dancing-bear.method: Put ingredients into tin, shake, and pour over ice.  Put seatbelt on and enjoy.

dancing-captain.method: Pour the captain into the glass and fill with root beer.

darth-vader.method: Shake all ingredients except Jagermeister in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into collins glass filled with ice.  Fill with Jagermeister.

date-rape-juice.method: Mix ingredients in a pitcher with ice.  Stir well.

dead-nazi.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

death-of-a-virgin.method: Add peach schnapps, vodka and lime juice to an irish coffee mug.  Fill half way with orange juice and the rest with 7-up.  Stir well.

death-star.method: In beer glass add Jagermeister, Gin, Drambuie,and Irish Cream.  Then fill in equal parts beer and Creme de Menthe.  Drink and see the Force!

deep-freeze.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

deep-throat.method: Combine vodka and Kahlua in a shot glass.  Add a puff of whipped cream on top.

detroit-red-wing.method: Build over ice in a double old-fashioned glass.

dewberry-martini.method: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

dewhaus.method: Pour 2 shots of Blackhaus in glass.  Add two ice cubes.  Fill with Mountain Dew.  Drop in a blackberry and add a mint leaf if available for presentation.

diamond-margarita.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

dick-in-the-dirt.method: Build over ice in a collins glass.

diesel.method: Add lager to a pint glass, then cordial.  Top with cider.  Use the cheapest lager and cider available!

dirk-diggler.method: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

dirty-banana.method: Mix Kahlua, Vodka, and milk in shaker with ice, pour in highball glass then cover with banana liqueur.

dirty-bird.method: Layer Wild Turkey on tequila in a shot glass.

dirty-bizzo.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

dirty-bloody-red-headed-slut.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, and serve without ice in a small rocks glass.

dirty-deigo.method: Beat eggs into the bloody mary mix, and squeeze the juice from half a fresh lemon into it.  Add the mixture to a highball glass with two oz. of tequila.

dirty-girl-scout.method: It's a simple one.  Pour all ingredients over ice, shake, strain, and get ready to party.  Careful though, it tastes yummy but will creep up on you!!!

dirty-martini.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice (including the olive!).  Strain into a well-chilled cocktail glass.  Add olive from the shaker.

dirty-panties.method: In a shot glass, fill 3/4 with tequila, add a drop of grenadine, then top with parmesan cheese...

dirty-russian.method: Fill glass half way with ice. Fill 1/4 with Kahlua and fill to the brim with eggnog. Stir until the drink is one solid color.

disco-ball.method: Mix ingredients together with ice and strain into a rocks glass over several ice cubes.

dizzy-damage.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

dons-rusty-nail.method:
Combine ingredients in a rocks glass.

Use Johnny Walker Black Label Scotch.

down-under-snowball.method: Combine ingredients in a blender and blend with ice.  Serve in a coupette glass.

dr-crown.method: Add 2 shots of Crown Royal to a highball glass then add Dr. Pepper and ice. Enjoy!

dr-jager.method: Fill cup half way with ice cubes.  Pour double shot of Jager over ice.  Fill with Dr. Pepper.

dr-pepper-2.method: Fill a beer mug 2/3 full of beer.  Drop a shot glass full of amaretto into the mug, and drink quickly!  Tastes just like Dr. Pepper.

drag-queen-with-an-attitude.method: Put ice in the glass, then add the vodka first, then the 7-up, then the orange juice, and then the cherry juice. Top with a cherry and an orange slice or leave it plain.

dreamsicle-2.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass over ice.

dreamsicle-punch.method: Mix ingredients in a punch bowl  (measure rum with the orange juice can).  Add some ice.

drunken-monkeys-lunch.method:
Pour the Kahlua, vodka, banana liqueur over cubed ice in an old-fashioned glass.  Fill with milk.  
Those crazy monkeys...

duck-fart.method: Layer the ingredients in a shot glass.

dundas-valley-ghost.method: Fill mixing glass with ice. Pour in ingredients (liqueurs first), shake and strain into glass. Garnish with lime wedge or wheel.

egg-nog.method: Pour whipping cream into a large (punch) bowl.  Whip until it starts to thicken.  Add two large eggs.  Whip until mixed.  Add 1 quart of Half-and-Half, plus vanilla and rum.  Mix well.  Sprinkle cinnamon, allspice and nutmeg.  Mix very lightly.  Using a cup or dipper, pour into old-fashioned glasses and serve.  Make sure rum, whipping cream and Half-and-Half are cold.

electric-blue-lemonade.method: Mix with ice and shake. Glow Cubes optional.

electric-jello.method: Make the Jell-O as you normally would (usually one cup of boiling water per package of Jell-O).  Once you've mixed the Jell-O powder, add in 2/3 the amount of vodka as you used water (ie.  if you used 3 cups of water to mix the jell-o, add 2 cups of vodka).  Put it in the freezer to set, as vodka requires colder temperatures than regular Jell-O.  If you have plastic shot glasses, these are great to chill it in as you can serve them individually.  If not, serve with a spoon!

electric-smurf.method: Fill lower half of glass with ice cubes.  Add rum and curacao. Fill glass half with pineapple juice, and half with Sprite. Stir slightly and serve.

elysium.method:
Ambrosia of the gods.  Shake all the ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

This combination also makes a great blended drink if you blend the ingredients with ice.

emerald-breeze.method: Shake all except ginger ale and soda with ice in a shaker, then pour over ice in a long cocktail glass and top with ginger ale and soda.

everhart.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

ewok-teabagging-a-mexican-trying-to-cros.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

exstatic-orgasm.method: In a blender add 1 shot each of the vodka, Kahlua and Irish Cream then add a handful of ice and blend.  Pour into glass, add milk and drink with straw.

fat-momma-knock-ya-naked-margaritas.method: In a large container, mix all ingredients. Stir. Add ice. Pour into glasses and enjoy!

fireball.method: Pour 1/3 oz. tabasco sauce into a shot glass. Fill the rest of the shot glass with cinnamon schnapps and serve.

firefly.method: Fill a highball glass with cubed ice.  Stir in vodka and grapefruit juice.  Add the grenadine after stirring, and place it in the center of the drink.

fizzy-ciclon.method: Put ice into glass.  Pour Ciclon over top.  Fill with Sprite.   Garnish with lime wedge.

fizzy-peach.method: Put some ice into a glass.  Add vodka, fill with tonic water.

flaming-blue-lamborghini.method: Take the 151 and put it into a cocktail glass.  Light it on fire.  Put two straws into the drink, begin to drink, and immediately pour the Kahlua and Spiced Rum into the glass.  Then pour the Blue Maui and Milk into the glass and finish the drink off.

flaming-dr-pepper.method: Fill mug with enough beer so that when you drop a shot glass in, it won't overflow.  Pour an ounce of amaretto into the shooter and carefully layer the 151 on top.  Light the shooter and drop it into the beer. Blow out the flame (optional) and chug it.

flaming-jesus.method: Pour vodka, lime juice and grenadine into a shooter.  Layer the 151 proof on top and light it, then drink.  (Blow flame out first.)

flaming-mexican-flag.method: Layer into a 2 oz. shooter: grenadine, then creme de menthe, tequila, then 151 on top. Light on fire, then blow out and slam.

flavor-flavs-get-krunked-punch.method: Mix together all ingredients and put into an igloo cooler with drink dispenser and add ice. Then serve in whatever cups you have.

flying-meister.method: Pour Red Bull into a regular glass, then drop in a shot glass full of Jagermeister. Shoot the whole thing.

flying-swan.method: Take glass of choice, mix one part Parrot bay and one part Sour Apple Pucker over ice. Top with OJ and enjoy. Add oranges and cherries for decoration.

flying-zambo.method: Shake everything together and pour into glass. Garnish with cherries.

foot-in-the-ass.method: Fill beer mug with 6 oz. of Vodka.  Splash Apple Juice and Orange Juice in with it. Drink fast, cause it tastes bad. Get ready, it feels like a foot in the ass!

four-horsemen-of-the-apocalypse-2.method: Pour all four in a glass.

french-connection-2.method: Combine ingredients in a brandy snifter.

french-kiss.method: Layer each shot in a tall shot glass. Take one quick drink.

frigid-alaskan-nipple.method: Mix everything in a shaker full of ice, pour into shot glass.

frozen-leprechaun.method: Blend ingredients (except mint sprig) in a bar blender with ice until smooth.  Pour into glass and garnish with mint leaf.

frozen-margarita.method: Blend all ingredients together and pour into glasses.  Add more ice to thicken the consistency if desired.

fruit-of-love.method: Cut up fruit and put in a bowl.  Add vodka and everclear and leave to sit for an hour.  Add Hawaiian Punch, Kool Aid, and Sprite, then stir.  The longer it sets the more alcohol the fruit soaks up.  (All fruit is optional, just depends on what you like).

fruit-salad-daquiri.method: Blend everything until smooth.  Add more ice for desired consistency.

fruit-tingle.method: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes, and pour the Curacao over top.  Pour an ounce of raspberry liqueur in at the same time as you fill the glass with lemonade, so that the drink is moderately mixed in the process.  The drink is meant to taste like Fruit Tingles lollies (and does!)

fryes-tropical-blast.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Pour into a double rocks glass.

fuck-me-by-the-pool.method: Start with one part Blue Maui, add one part Peach schnapps, and finish it up with orange juice.

fuck-me-hard.method: Mix everything well and serve over ice.

fuck-me-in-the-ass-sideways.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glass.

fucker-upper.method: Mix Lime Juice and Amaretto together in your choice of glass. Better when Lime Juice is chilled. No ice needed.

fun-ship.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker, filling with equal parts of orange juice and pineapple juice. Shake and strain into cocktail glasses.

funky-cold-medina.method: Pour everything into a jar with ice.

funky-monkey.method: Blend everything except cocunut with enough ice to provide a slushy consistency.  Serve with a sprinkle of coconut on top.

fuzzball.method: Add ingredients to a highball glass with ice.

fuzzy-blue-gobbler.method: Shake everything with ice; strain into shot glass.

fuzzy-navel.method: Add ingredients to a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

fuzzy-shark.method: Blend everything (except curacao) together until smooth.  Pour into glass and splash on the curacao.

gale-at-sea.method: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

gay-pirate.method: Mix all ingredients together in glass with ice.

gdf.method: Fill a glass halfway with beer.  Fill another quarter with amaretto and top off with cola.

german-chocolate-cake.method: Shake vodka and Frangelico in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.  Coat lemon slice with sugar. Drink shot then bite lemon.

gestapo.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

get-laid.method: Combine ingredients in a highball glass, adding a splash of cranberry juice on top.

get-laid-lemonade.method: Put the beer and the vodka in a large container. Add the two lemonade concentrates.  Stir until lemonade has melted.

ghost.method: Fill a 16 oz. glass with ice add 1 shot Jack Daniel's, 2 shots Vanilla Rum and top with Cream soda. We call it the Ghost becouse it will sneak up on you and if you drink to much it will haunt you later.

ghostbuster.method: Fill a cocktail shaker half full with ice cubes.  Measure and pour all the ingredients into shaker and shake well.  Strain into cocktail glass.  Drink while cold.

gin-and-juice.method: Measure ice into a cocktail shaker with a highball glass.  Add ingredients and shake well.  Pour into highball glass and garnish with a slice of lime.

gin-and-tonic.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Garnish with a twist of lime.

gin-breeze.method: Stir liquors into collins glass over ice, fill with ginger ale, garnish with half an orange slice on glass rim.

gina.method: Pour alcohol into a shot glass first.  Splash a bit of pineapple juice in, then fill with cranberry juice, and garnish with the cherry on top.  This is great if you mix it and pour it into a test tube to shoot.  Tastes like Hawaiian Punch with a kick....yummy!

gingerbread-man.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into shot glasses.

girls-night.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into cocktail glasses.

gladiator.method: In a shot glass, combine 1/2 oz. Amaretto and 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort. Place shot glass in a highball glass. Fill half-way to shot glass with 7-Up, fill to just below top of shot glass with Orange Juice. Shoot it.

god-father.method: Build over ice in a rocks glass.

godfather.method: Build over ice in a rocks glass.

godiva-chocolate-covered-banana.method: Blend in a bar blender until smooth.  Pour into a highball glass and garnish with some of the remaining banana.

golden-elk.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

goombay-smach.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.  If desired, float 1/2 oz. dark rum on top.

granny-smith-martini.method: Shake all ingredients with crushed ice and strain into chilled martini glass.  Perfect performance will result in a layer of shaved ice floating on the top.  Follow by dropping in the cherry and then serve.

grape-ape.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

grasshopper.method: Shake ingredients for a few seconds in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

grateful-dead.method: Mix vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple sec, and sour mix in a mixing tin. Strain into glass and top with Raspberry Liqueur (circle the perimeter of the glass).

greek-sex-on-the-beach.method: Mix everything together and shake well. Serve in glass about 2/3 full of ice.

green-cookie-monster.method: Pour ingredients in shot glass.  It might be possible to layer this drink if you're really careful, but the result probably isn't worth the effort.

green-froggy.method: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass with ice.

green-iguana-frozen-margarita.method:
Lightly salt the rim of a coupe or a coupette glass.
Add the ingredients to a blender with a handful of ice cubes or partially crushed ice.  Blend until smooth in consistency and serve.

green-lantern-2.method: Add Red Bull and Hypnotiq to a cocktail glass with ice.

green-russian-2.method: Add vodka and creme de menthe, add ice to glass. After ice is added put in milk and stir.

grizzly-bear.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

hail-queen-candace.method: Build over ice starting with vodka, triple sec and fill with cranberry juice then the sour raspberry pucker. Garnish with a lime wedge and straw. Drink it through the straw and you'll find this kinda tastes like a "Raspberry Blowpop" sucker. Enjoy!

harvest-moon.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Garnish with an apple wedge and a cinnamon stick.

harvey-wallbanger.method: Mix vodka and orange juice in a collins glass with ice cubes.  Stir well, and float the Galliano on top.  Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

hawaii-mai-tai.method: Mix all ingredients together, serve chilled. This is the best Mai Tai ever. Authentic recipe from Hawaii. This recipe makes one gallon.

hawaiian-cocktail.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

hawaiian-island-sunset.method: Build in highball glass filled with ice, stir and enjoy!

hawaiian-king.method: Pour Crown Royal into shot glass first, then layer pineapple liqueur on top.  Shoot.

hawaiian-rain-drops.method: Build over ice, stir, and enjoy!

hawaiian-surfer.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass over ice.

heart-attack.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

heart-warmer.method: Build over ice in an old-fasioned glass.

heaven-sent.method: Pour all of the ingredients into a ice filled shaker. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve and enjoy.

heberts-alexander.method: Add ingredients into shaker with ice and shake well. Pour into cocktail class, and sprinkle some nutmeg or cinnamon.

hercules.method: Pour rye over ice, adding cola, southern comfort, and lime.  Stir and serve.

hi-speed.method: Add gin and lemon rum to a plastic beer cup.  Fill with Red Bull.  Add a few ice cubes.

hidden-nightmare.method: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice.  Shake and strain into a highball glass.

hokkaido-cocktail.method: Shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

holy-bartender.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

holy-water.method: Mix it all together with ice.

homemade-long-island-iced-tea.method: Combine everything into a big pitcher.  Squeeze the juice out of the lemons and limes into the pitcher.  Serve in highball glasses filled with ice.

horny-monkey.method: Pour in Sambuca, and float the banana liqueur on top.

horny-white-girl.method: Pour cream soda first, then the vodka, and then add the Bailey's. Serve chilled, or on ice.

hot-and-spicy-men.method: Fill glass with ice, pour in liquor, fill with dr. pepper, stir, and drink it down!

hot-buttered-rum.method: Pour the water and the brown sugar into an Irish Coffee glass.  Stir until the brown sugar is dissolved.  Add the Rum and the clove and stir.  Drop the butter on top of the drink, and dust with a light layer of nutmeg.

hot-damn-dew.method: Pour Mountain Dew into a collins glass with ice. Then pour in a shot of Hot Damn. Mix together by stirring slightly.

hot-lesbian-sex.method: Add equal parts of both brandys and the peach schnapps in a shot glass, top with 151, set fire to it and serve.

hot-toddy.method: Add everything except nutmeg and cinnamon to the glass and fill with boiling water.  Note that you can use any liquor with this - brandy and schnapps are popular substitutes for whiskey.  Add the cinnamon stick to the glass and sprinkle with nutmeg.

howling-dingo.method: Add ice to jar, then amaretto, then add rum. Then fill the rest of the Mason-jar up with Dr.Pepper, stir slowly.

hpno-ade.method: Add Hypnotiq first, then fill with Gatorade.

hpnotized-by-a-tattooed-bullfighter-whil.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

hummingbird.method: Put all ingredients in a blender and blend till smooth.  Pour into glass and garnish with pineapple and cherry. This drink is served all over Jamaica.

hurricane.method: Pour everything into a glass filled with ice and stir.

hypnosis-2.method: Fill highball glass with ice. Add Hpnotiq and rum. Fill with Sprite.

hypnotiq-martini.method: Mix in a shaker with ice and serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

ice-bear.method: Fill a tall glass with ice, layer the vodka and blue Curacao, top up with 7-Up and stir.

ice-cream-schnapps.method: Scoop ice cream into glass, pour butterscotch schnapps and coke over top ice cream.

incredible-heart.method: Fill 3/4 of the glass with pink champagne, then fill the glass with Hpnotiq.

incredible-hulk.method: Chill both the beverages before use. Add equal parts Hpnotiq and Hennessy cognac.  The result is a mean green drink with a fruity but killer bite.

irish-car-bomb.method: Pour half a pint of chilled Guinness into a beer mug and let it settle.  Take a shot glass filled with 1/2 oz. of Irish whiskey on the bottom and 1/2 oz. of Irish cream on top.  Drop the shot glass into the Guinness and chug.

irish-flag.method: In a shot glass, layer creme de menthe first, then Bailey's, then Grand Marnier.  Make sure each floats on the other.  Beannachtam na Femle Padrag!

irish-flag-2.method: This is a very tasty layered drink.  Pour creme de menthe in first, then, using a spoon (bar spoons are handy for this), pour in Irish cream and then brandy.

irish-float.method: Layer Irish cream on top of the cola.  Serve with a straw.

irish-mudslide.method: Use a chilled beer mug.  Add Irish cream and fill with root beer.

irish-russian.method: In a blender add 1 shot each of the vodka, Kahlua and Irish Cream then add a handful of ice and blend.  Pour into glass, add milk and drink with straw.

irish-trash-can.method: Fill glass full of ice, then add all liquors and stir.  Add full can of Red Bull.  It will float and slowly seep down the glass, turning the mix green, hence the name Irish Trash Can!

irish-wake.method: Pour orange juice over ice into a mason jar. Add rums and stir. Then add blue curacao and top with a red and a green cherry.

iron-curtain.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

island-breeze.method: Build over ice, stir, and enjoy!

italian-heather.method: Fill an old-fashioned glass almost full with ice (crushed ice is best).  Add Galliano and Scotch.  Stir, and add wedge of lime.

jack-and-coke.method: Mix ingredients in a tumbler with ice and enjoy.

jager-bomb.method: Pour Red Bull into a regular glass, then drop in a shot glass full of Jagermeister. Shoot the whole thing.

jager-monster.method: Fill a highball glass with ice.  Add Jagermeister, then fill with orange juice.  Add grenadine on top.

jagerbeer-bomb.method: Pour the beer into a glass, then drop the shot of Jagermeister into it (shot glass optional).  Tastes just like root beer.

jagerbomb.method: Pour Red Bull into a regular glass, then drop in a shot glass full of Jagermeister. Shoot the whole thing.

jagerschlager.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

jaggerbaby.method: Just half of each. No layering required.

jamaican-10-speed.method: Add all ingredients into shaker (except cherry) with ice. A few good shakes, then strain into hurricane glass filled with ice. Garnish with cherry, and enjoy!

jamaican-creamsicle.method: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake for minute or two and strain into a cocktail glass.

jamaican-crow.method: Fill a collins glass almost full with ice, and your shaker half full with ice.  Pour all ingredients except soda into shaker and shake well. Strain into glass.  Add the carbonated water (club soda) and stir well.  Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry if available.

james-bond-martini.method: Shaken not stirred.  Garnish with olive and toothpick.

james-juice.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

jello-shots.method: Make the Jell-O as you normally would (usually one cup of boiling water per package of Jell-O).  Once you've mixed the Jell-O powder, add in 2/3 the amount of vodka as you used water (ie.  if you used 3 cups of water to mix the jell-o, add 2 cups of vodka).  Put it in the freezer to set, as vodka requires colder temperatures than regular Jell-O.  If you have plastic shot glasses, these are great to chill it in as you can serve them individually.  If not, serve with a spoon!

joels-lover.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

jolly-rancher-2.method: Pour all ingredients in tall glass over ice. Shake once.

josh-and-maciej-drink.method: Put whipped cream in first.  Then the alcohol, and finally the mixers. Stir until the whipped cream is mixed evenly throughout.

jp5-jet-fuel.method: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into chilled martini glass.

june-bug.method: Fill shaker with ice.  Mix all ingredients together and shake vigorously.  Pour into shot glasses.  Enjoy!

jungle-juice.method: Add ice in bowl, add the fruit, pour in the fruit punch then add your gin, vodka, and rum and stir well. Pour into glasses with ice.

jungle-punch.method: Dump punch and liquors together. Top with ginger ale.

kahlua-and-cream.method: Shake kahlua and cream with ice and pour over ice into an old-fashioned glass.

kahlua-earthquake.method: Add Kahlua and Tequila to glass, add ice and top up with Cola.

kahlua-frost.method: Blend everything until smooth. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

kahlua-hummer.method: Add equal parts of Kahlua and Rum to a jug. Add ice cream and top up with milk and blend with a hand-held blender until smooth and creamy. Place a small scoop of ice cream in each glass before pouring.

kahlua-kolada.method: Blend all (except the pineapple slice) with ice cubes until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass, and garnish with a pineapple wedge, orchid flower and cocktail umbrella. Enjoy this original from the Mauna Lani Bay Hotel on the Big Island of Hawaii.

kahlua-mudslide.method: Shake everything with ice.  Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice.

kamikaze.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.  Garnish with a lime wedge and a stir stick.

kamikaze-margarita.method: Blend everything until smooth.  Pour into glasses and serve.

kamikaze-on-the-rag.method: Fill a shaker with ice. Add ingredients and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

kamikaze-shooter.method: Pour ice cold vodka, triple sec, and sour mix into a chilled shot glass.  Drop a pinch of sugar into the shooter and frost the glass with the remaining.

kamora-coffee-italiano.method: Add liqueurs to your hot cup of coffee.  Float a puff of whipped cream on top.

kanawfuls-serum.method: Pour 1 part Kahlua, then pour 1 part Cream de Cacao (white), then pour 1 part Bailey's Irish Cream in a shot glass. Top it off with a puff of whipped cream.

karens-melons.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Fill with 7-up or Sprite.  Try to toss the lime wedge from behind your back and into the drink.

karjylman.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

kashmeister.method: Add some ice if you want, then add ingredients and stir to mix together.

kentucky-crack.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

kick-in-the-ace.method: Pour ingredients into a mixing cup and stir until colour is uniform.  Do not shake, Aqualibra is carbonated! Pour into shot glasses and shoot.

kinky-orgasm.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Stir.

ko-punch.method: Drink fast so you can have another:)

koj.method: Add ingredients to glass and mix lightly.

l-a-water.method: Pour vodka, gin, rum, triple sec, blue curacao and raspberry liqueur into a glass with ice. Fill it with sour mix.

latin-dream.method: Shake all ingredients together, without ice, and pour into glass. Garnish with a slice of orange. Enjoy!

lava-flow.method:
In a blender combine: coconut milk, cream of coconut, 1 cup ice, pineapple (should be crushed), and 1.5 oz. of light rum. 
After that is blended, combine in another blender:
1 cup ice, 1.5 oz. of light rum, strawberries, sugar, strawberry schnapps, and lime juice. When both concoctions are finished combine them both. should make up to 2-4 servings. (The drink is really a strawberry daquiri and pina colada mixed together.)

lava-lamp.method: Combine strawberry schnapps, Kahlua and Frangelico in a shot glass.  Carefully layer the Irish cream on top, then add a few drops of Advocaat.

lawn-mower.method: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass with ice.

leg-opener.method: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour brandy over the ice followed by Butterscotch Schnapps.

leg-spreader-2.method: Put all of your ingredients in a shaker 2/3 full of ice. Shake well, fill the glass with ice and strain mixture into glass. Garnish with a cherry.

lemon-drop.method: Sugar the rim of a cocktail glass.  Shake vodka and triple sec with ice in a cocktail shaker.  Strain into glass, top with lemon juice.  Garnish with a twist of lemon.

lemon-drop-2.method: Mix 2 tbsp. of lemonade mix with vodka in a cocktail glass.  Fill with Mountain Dew.  Stir well and add ice.

lemon-drop-shot.method: Cut lemon into wedges. Dip a wedge in sugar, making sure both sides are covered, but not clumpy.  Slam a shot of vodka, (Absolut Citron preferred,) suck on sugar-covered lemon wedge. Very tasty.

lemon-grass.method:
1  Add crushed ice to the highball class then and the cointreau. 
2. Fill with lemonade
3. Add a 1/2 shot of blue curacao to make it turn green

lime-green-sensation.method: Add ingredients to martini shaker with ice, shake well, strain into cocktail glass and enjoy!

liquid-big-red.method: Retrieve your choice cup and put in the ice.  Once the ice is in, add the 2 oz. Goldschlager and then add the 2 oz. Jagermeister. Pour Dr. Pepper until the cup is full. Make sure to check out the foam, there should be gold flecks sitting on top of your drink.  Enjoy your "Liquid Big Red."

liquid-cocaine.method: Pour all together in a shot glass and shoot at your own risk.

liquid-cocaine-2.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into an extremely large shot glass.

liquid-heroin.method: Mix in double shot glass. Chase with beer.

liquid-heroin-3.method: Shake everything together and strain into shot glass.

liquid-marijuana.method: Put all measured ingredients in glass and fill the remainder with pineapple juice. Shake vigorously. Garnish with a flag.

liquid-panty-dropper.method: Combine all alcoholic ingredients except peach schnapps.  Fill most of the way with orange juice, leaving room for a few splashes of cranberry and pineapple juice and  a float of peach schnapps on top.  Garnish with two cherries.

lisas-rooted-beer-float.method: First chill the Beer Mugs in the freezer.  Place 2 oz. root beer schnapps in glass then the 1 oz. vanilla schnapps. Tilt glass and slowly pour in about 8 oz. of vanilla coke. Slowly set it upright and place two tablespoons of Cool Whip. Garnish with a cherry.

little-yellow-different.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

long-beach-iced-tea.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a collins glass full of ice and garnish with a wedge of lemon.

long-island-iced-tea.method: Pour everything into a collins glass, splashing cola on tthe top, and stir gently.  Garnish with a lemon spiral and a straw.

love-in-a-glass.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into two glasses.  Great for weddings.

love-you-now-screw-you-later.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

lunch-pail.method: Combine beer and orange juice in a beer mug.  Drop in a 1 oz. shot glass full of Amaretto and drink quickly.

lynchburg-lemonade.method: Shake all ingredients except 7-up in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a highball glass and fill with 7-up.

lyndon-state-rugger.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

macbeth.method: Shake ingredients with ice; strain into a cocktail glass.

mad-dog.method: Add the cherry juice, then vodka and finally a drop of tabasco!

madras.method: Pour all ingredients (except lime wedge) into a highball glass over ice. Add the lime wedge as a garnish.

magfest-mule.method: Mix equal amounts of each ingredient and pour into test tube chill before serving.

mai-tai.method: Shake everything except the dark rum in a shaker filled with ice.  Strain into a highball glass over crushed ice. Float with the rum and garnish with a pineapple spear, lime peel and a straw.

malibu-bay-breeze.method: Add everything to a glass with ice and stir.

malibu-breeze.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Pour into glass. Adjust pinanpple juice to taste.

malibu-italian-surfer.method: Add all ingredients to a highball glass with ice.

malibu-margarita-punch.method: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl.  Add ice before serving.

malibu-mojito.method: Muddle lime wedges, mint leaves, and sugar with a splash of club soda. Fill glass with ice and add the Malibu rum & 1 oz. club soda. Shake all ingredients together. Try not to shake too hard so you don't flatten the soda.

malibu-twist.method: Fill glass 1/2 full of ice. Pour in Malibu Rum. Next add 7-up and OJ, then stir. Add splash of Grenadine for color.

mandarin-mojito.method: Add mint and lime wedge into Collins glass, then muddle. Fill glass with ice. Add half Sprite (or 7-up) and the other half with sweet and sour mix. Shake in mixing tin and pour.

mango-martini.method: Blend everything until smooth, pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

manhattan.method: Shake whiskey, vermouth and bitters with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top with a maraschino cherry and serve.

manhattan-max-allen.method: Stir or shake all ingredients except cherry with ice until cold. Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.

margarita.method: Salt the rim of a coupe (or coupette) glass. Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

margarita-1948-original.method:
The true authentic margarita invented by Margarita Sames in Aculpulco in 1948.  Shake with ice and pour into a coupe glass with a lightly salted rim.
See also Frozen Margarita for the slushy modern version.
