marijuana-milkshake.method: Mix all ingredients in a shot glass.  Then shoot.

martha-stewart.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

martian-martini.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

martini-dry.method:
Stir 5 parts gin and 1 part vermouth with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive, and serve. 

An acceptable alternate garnish is to squeeze the oil from a lemon peel into the drink.

martini-extra-dry.method: Swish a cocktail glass with a teaspoon of vermouth, discard the excess.  Add the gin and one or two olives on a pick.

melon-ball.method: Add all ingredients to a highball glass with ice.  Stir and garnish with an orange slice if desired.

melon-pants.method:
Fill a collins glass with ice. Add the ingredients and stir. Garnish with a chunk of watermelon if desired.

If you have frozen margarita mix (or a blender and some ice), you could always try making a Frozen Melon Pants.  Let us know how it goes.

merlins-monkey.method: Add milk to 8 oz. cocktail glass. Then add liquors together with milk. Stir, and add ice if desired.

mess-you-up.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

mexican-fuck.method: 1 shot Kaluha, 2 shots Tequila, 2 shots of champange. Pour all in glass ... in that order! DO NOT STIR! Place handkerchief over glass and slam down on counter! Then drink it before the foam bubbles away!

michelada.method: Just put'em all together in a beer mug or glass, and mix well.

michelles-indigo.method: Shake everything but blue curacao, 7-up and sugar in a shaker with ice.  Strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes.  Stir in sugar and fill with 7-up.  Drop the blue curacao into the center of the drink and serve without stirring.

midori-colada.method: Blend ingredients together with 1 cup of ice.  Add more ice if desired consistency is not achieved.

midori-sour.method: Add all ingredients into a sour glass and stir.

mikes-bloody-mary.method: Fill glass with ice.  Add vodka, celery salt, pepper, hot sauce, steak sauce and worcestershire.  Add pickle juice (or try pepper juice) and then tomato juice.  Stir, then add horseradish and stir again.  Celery, pickels, and olives make great garnish!

milk-n-cookies.method: Combine ingredients in a collins glass.  Fill with milk.

mimosa.method: Pour chilled orange juice, and add chilled champagne.

mind-eraser.method: Layer the vodka, Kahlua, then soda.

mint-julep.method: Muddle mint leaves, sugar, and water in a collins glass. Fill glass with shaved ice and pour in the bourbon. Garnish with a mint leaf.

misdemeanor.method: Mix ingredients together with ice, strain into shot glass.

missouri-rattlesnake.method: Shake well and pour in a cocktail glass over ice.

mistletoe-martini.method: Chill cocktail glass. In a mixing glass, pour all ingredients together.

mmf-mean-mother-fucker.method: Mix all ingredients except pineapple juice in a shaker on ice.  Pour into collins glass.  Fill with pineapple juice.  Add orange slice and cherries.  Tastes just like fruit punch!

mojito.method: Gently muddle the lime juice, mint leaves, and sugar syrup together at the bottom of the glass.  Fill the glass with ice, then slowly add the rum.  Fill with soda and stir gently to bring the leaves upwards into the mixture.  Optionally add lime wedges as an addition garnish.

mojo.method: Put everything but the beer in a large party bowl, mix it up, add ice then add the beer.  Tastes great!

moms-apple-pie.method: Add vodka and apple juice to shot glass.  Puff whipped cream on top, sprinkle with cinnamon.

moms-breakfast.method: Put ice into glass.  Pour in amaretto.  Pour in orange juice.  Stir.  Garnish with orange slice or wedge.

monkey-balls.method: Float banana liqueur on tequila rose.

monkeys-lunch.method: Add ingredients to an old-fashioned glass with ice.

montana-sunrise.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass. Drink prior to work.

moran-o-sweet.method: Shake amaretto, vodka, and orange juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a highball glass with ice. Add 3 drops of lemon juice on top.

morgans-mountain.method: Shake everything except the kahlua with ice; strain into a cocktail glass with one ice cube in the center.  Dribble the Kahlua down the ice cube.

morphine-drip.method: Pour 1/2 shot butterscotch schnapps into shot glass.  Top with 1/2 shot of amaretto, splash with 151 rum and light on fire.  Put out fire and drink.

mort.method: Mix ingredients in any fashion and top off with orange juice.  The Mort is phonetic: Midori, Orange juice, Rumple minze, Tequila, so it is easy to remember.

moscow-mule.method: After all ingredients have been thoroughly shaken together, they are to be poured over ice...in a copper mug! This is very important, if you do not serve it in a copper mug, it will not taste like it was meant to be.

mounds-martini.method: Pour over ice in shaker.  Shake well.  Served up in a chilled martini glass. Garnish with shaved coconut if desired.

mountain-dont.method: Mix in an old-fashioned, over ice. Stir and enjoy.

mr-p.method: In a cocktail glass, add cherry flavouring, cherry juice, vodka, and fill the rest of the glass with Mountain Dew and garnish with a piece of pineapple.

mudslide.method: Add ingredients to a highball glass half filled with ice.

muff-diver.method: Pour Bailey's and Kahlua into a shot glass. Put shot glass in center of an empty margarita glass. Fill around and on top of the shot glass with whipped cream. This is the guy version of the "Blow Job" shot. The guy must drink this HANDS FREE off of the counter. Leaves a circle of cream on his face! Add a cherry if you think he won't choke on it.

multiple-screaming-orgasm.method: Pour all ingredients into glass over ice.

neon-nightmare.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a hurricane glass.

neopolitan-dream.method: Pour cream and coconut milk into blender.  Blend at high speed for 1 minute, until frothy.  Add the Ice Cream (Neopolitan), milk and Kahlua, then blend for 2 - 3 minutes (you can add more Kahlua if you'd prefer).  Put in freezer for 5 - 10 minutes to chill, since the blending heats it up, or drink immediately.

netherland.method: Build over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

new-orleans-hurricane.method: Shake all ingredients except 151-proof rum in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Pour into a hurricane glass and float the 151-proof rum on top.  Drink through a straw from the bottom up.

norwegian-coffee.method: Make some coffee of your choice. Fill the coffee cup half-way with coffee, add a penny, and pour your alcohol in the cup until the penny floats. Take the penny out and you've got yourself what we say in norway, "Karsk".

nuts-and-berries.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

nutty-colada.method: Blend everything in a blender with ice until smooth.  Serve in a collins glass with a straw.

nutty-irishwoman.method: Serve in a shot glass.  Slainte!

nymphomaniac.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a shot glass.

oatmeal.method: Layer Irish cream on top of the cola.  Serve with a straw.

oatmeal-cookie.method: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a shot glass.

oatmeal-cookie-3.method: Layer in a shot glass (or add everything to a hot cup of coffee!).

ocean-spray-monkey-drink.method: Add a few ice cubes to glass. Pour in 2 oz. banana liqueur, then fill with fruit punch. Stir.

oklahoma-rattler.method: Cover the bottom of a shot glass with Tabasco sauce and fill the rest with Tequila.

old-bastard.method: Shake all ingredients with ice.  Strain into an old-fashioned glass with a couple of ice cubes.

old-fashioned.method:
Add the sugar cube to an old fashioned glass and soak with the bitters and a dash of soda water.  Muddle until the sugar is dissolved, then fill the glass with ice and slowly add the whiskey.

It is correct to garnish with a slice of orange, a lemon twist, and two maraschino cherries.

one-night-stand.method: Blend ingredients with shiny mix thingy. Best results when chilled.

ones-nitro.method: Mix lemon/lime together before you put it into the glass with the red bull.

Powder drink mix (Crystal Light Sunrise.ingredient: Powder drink mix (Crystal Light Sunrise Classic Orange)

orange-amnesia.method:
To successfully mix this large quantity of drink I recommend a gallon jug with a screw-down lid.  Fill the gallon jug half full of 7-up, Sierra Mist, or any other decent lemon lime soda. Next add in four cups of Sunny Delight. Add all six packets of Crystal Light classic orange, screw down the lid, and shake until the contents are mixed thoroughly.

Pour the orange mix into a punch bowl. Immediately add both bottles of vodka and the remaining lemon lime soda and sunny delight.  If desired add a bottle or two of Bawls to the mix for an added kick.

Serve chilled. Serves up to five people very well!

orange-flux.method: Fill a shaker half full with ice cubes.  Pour all ingredients into shaker and shake well.  Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

orange-push-up-jungle-juice.method: In a very large container(enough to hold 3 to 4 gallons) mix in all ingredients and stir until thickens. Instead of orange sherbert you can use orange, lime, and raspberry sherbert. The more you stir the thicker and tastier it gets. My advice is to make it in a large multi-gallon cooler and enjoy on a warm, lazy afternoon.

orange-shooter.method: Put a pinch of sugar in a double shot glass. Add vodka, lemon juice, and orange juice.  Swirl glass before drinking.

orchard-martini.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into sugar rimmed glass. Garnish with orange slice.

orgasm.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into an old fashioned glass or into shooters.  Garnish with a cherry.

orgasm-on-the-beach.method: In a shaker add all ingredients and shake well to chill, then pour into a cocktail glass. You can garnish it with some cherries or lemon slices or both as desired.

over-the-top.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

p-hood-118.method: Add Red Bull and vodka to a collins class, and drop in a slice of lime.  Stir and serve.

paco-mix.method: In a beer mug add ice, lemon and salt, then add the beer, stir a bit, add the tabasco sauce and the worcestershire sauce. Finally add the tequila and vodka.

panty-hamster.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

panty-ripper.method: Mix everything in a glass with ice.

paradise-bliss.method: Pour in vodka & rum. Follow with pineapple juice. Top off with cranberry. stir and enjoy! Try Dole's pineapple-banana juice for a great variation.

paradise-in-april.method: Mix the ingredients together in a glass half filled with ice.

paralyzer.method: Stir everything into an old-fashioned glass with ice cubes.  For a weaker version, use a taller glass.

passion-mimosa.method: Add passion fruit juice to a champagne glass.  Fill with champagne and garnish with a strawberry.

peachy-pirate.method: Fill highball with ice, add rum and schnapps, fill rest of glass with OJ, garnish with cherries.

peachy-screw-gin-fizz.method: Put some ice cubes into a glass.  Add Gin, Triple Sec, and Peach Schnapps.  Pour in tonic and orange juice.  Stir.  Garnish with lime wedge.

peachy-sunrise.method: Fill glass with ice and pour in a shot of tequila and a shot of peach schnapps.  Fill with orange juice and add a splash of grenadine.  Mix with straw.

peanut-butter-jelly-2.method: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into shot glass.

pearl-necklace.method: Mix even quantities in a shaker with ice, strain, and serve in cocktail (martini) glass.

peppermint-patty.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

peppermint-stick.method: Shake everything with ice; strain into a champagne glass.  Garnish with a candy cane!

pez.method: Fill beer mug with ice...add vodka...fill with Red Bull. Tastes like Pez candy.

pickled-mountie.method: Pour ingredients into glass filled with ice. Mix. Can also be mixed in a shaker and served over ice.

piece-of-ass.method: First fill the glass 3/4 with ice, then amaretto, southern comfort and lime juice and then fill 'er up with Sprite. Sweet, but very good...

pimp-juice-2.method: Fill glass with ice and pour HypnotiQ over ice. Pour Alize on top of the HypnotiQ.

pina-colada.method: Add everything into blender with crushed ice.  Blend, adding ice until desired consistency is reached.  Pour into hurricane glasses and garnish with a pineapple wedge (and/or a cherry), and little umbrellas or a straw.

pineapple-upside-down-cake.method: Combine all ingredients in a tumbler and shake.  Pour into Collins glass.

pineapple-upside-down-cake-martini.method: Shake vanilla vodka & pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.  Add a dash or two of grenadine so it settles to the bottom of the glass. Garnish with a cherry.

pineapple-upsidedown-cake.method: First pour the codka in the glass, about a shot. Then the pineapple juice, then a splash of grenendine.

pineapple-wine-cooler.method: Shake everything except soda with ice; strain into a collins glass.  Add 2 oz. of soda and garnish with a pineapple spear if desired.

pink.method: Add all ingredients into a shaker/blender and mix until frothy.

pink-lemonade.method: Mix everything together and top with the grenadine.

pink-panties.method: Shake everything with ice; strain into a shot glass.

pink-panty-pull-down.method: Make the lemonade as you normally would, adding the vodka in last. Stir to combine and serve in plastic drinking cups. Great for parties.

pink-panty-pulldown.method: Mix ingredients in a clean medium size cooler.  Add one bag of ice. Stir well. The longer it sits, the better it gets.  Serves several people.

pink-pleasures.method: Put all ingredients in a blender and blend with 2 cups of ice.  Serve in a martini glass with a sugared rim and a lemon twist.

pink-pull-your-panties-down.method: Six pack of beer, 1 frozen pink lemonade, rum, and lime juice.  Mix it.....

pink-pussy.method: Over ice in collins glass pour 2parts lemon rum with one part teuila,dash Grand Marnier,fill w/sour mix then add just a bit of cranberry for color cover w/shaker and give it enough shake to froth.

pink-russian.method: Shake liquors with ice; strain into glass. Fill with milk.

pinkeye.method: Pour everything into a shot glass.

pirates-of-the-caribbean.method: Shake alcoholic ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a highball glass filled half way with ice, then add juices.  Garnish using a pineapple slice with a sword.

pj.method: Prepare all of your fruits by draining juices from pears, peaches, oranges, and cherries, and cut up strawberries, pineapple, and watermelon into small chunks. You need a very large upright cooler for this, preferably the kind with a spout on the bottom. Put all of your fruit in the bottom and mixed it around. Pour in Fruit Punch and then add Everclear. Mix this around really good and let it set for at least 24 hours! It doesn't take much with this great tasting drink! Don't forget the fruit at the bottom, just eating it will get you drunk!

poinsettia.method: In champagne flute fill half with champagne and half with cranberry juice. That's it.

poker-face.method: Stir everything into a glass with ice.  Garnish with a lime wedge.

polar-bear-shot.method: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into shooters.

poliuke.method: Mix everything into glass with ice.

porn-star-shooter.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass. You can use any flavour of Sourpuss to make variations on the drink.

pornstar.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass. You can use any flavour of Sourpuss to make variations on the drink.

pornstar-shooter.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass. You can use any flavour of Sourpuss to make variations on the drink.

power-hour.method: Get together with a bunch of friends, fill up lots of shots of beer. Drink one shot of beer every minute for an hour. See who can complete the power hour!

prairie-fire.method: Cover the bottom of a shot glass with Tabasco sauce and fill the rest with Tequila.

princess-martini.method: Pour gin into glass and add equal parts orange juice and pineapple juice.  Top up glass with Fresca.

pucker-bomb.method: Drop a shot of apple pucker into a mug of beer.

puerto-rican-sky-rocket.method: Named for a bartender in the Olde Time Bar in 43rd St. in Manhattan.  Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass and enjoy.

punch-in-the-stomach.method: Fill a Collins glass halfway with ice. Add tequila, then fill the rest with half sprite, half hawaiian punch, give it a stir, garnish with pineapple slice and enjoy!

purple-drank.method: Combine ingredients in a punch bowl, and put in the freezer for 15 minutes.

purple-fuck.method: Put the drinks in the glass and fill with the cranberry juice.

purple-hooter.method: Mix together over ice and strain into shot glass.  Check out purple lobster for another option.

purple-hooters.method: Add equal parts of each ingredient to shot glasses.

purple-jesus.method: Stir everything into an ice-filled highball glass.

purple-mask.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

purple-mother-fucker.method: Mix all ingredients and fill with 7-up.  Shake with ice and put in pitcher.  Pour shots.

purple-passion.method: Mix everything in a chilled collins glass with ice.

purple-pimpnotic.method: Add ingredients together and put into the freezer for five hours before serving.

purple-rain.method: Add ice and mix in blender for a frozen drink. Or shake with ice and pour into ice-filled glass.

purple-sour-banana.method: First pour in the Banana, then slowly pour in the curacao and raspberry.  The banana should just be visible on the bottom of the glass while the raspberry and curacao turn purple.

purple-turtle.method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

pussy-juice.method: Place three or four ice cubes in a highball glass. Pour in vodka and rum over the ice. Next, add one can of Red Bull. Add maraschino cherry syrup to taste. Garnish with one or two cherries.

quebecer-banana-blow-job.method: Mix the cream, banana liqueur and vodka into the shot glass.  It has to be drank the same way as a traditional blow job, the glass on the floor and without the hands.

rasberry-martini.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass. Add lemon twist to garnish glass.

raspberry-felch.method: Combine ingredients into warmed old fashioned glass or shooter and drink through a straw.

raspberry-jello-spritzer.method: Mix Jello with 2 cups boiling water. Once disolved set in fridge to cool for 10 minutes. Add 7-up, vodka and Chambord (raspberry liquor) to and stir until blended. On a cookie sheet, line plastic 1 oz cups or dixie cups and pour into containers. Chill until firm and serve.

raspberry-martini.method: Combine all ingredients in a mixing tin.  Shake very well.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.  Garnish with lemon and lime zest.  A fresh raspberry is also nice.

raspberry-swirl.method: Blend everything but the raspberry liqueur in a blender and pour into a hurricane glass.  Add the raspberry liqueur very slowly while you swirl it in to the drink.

rasta-spliff.method: Build over ice in a collins glass.

rata-peach.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

rattlesnake.method: In a shot glass, carefully layer Kahlua, then creme de cacao, then Bailey's Irish Cream.

raver-girl.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

razz-and-sprite.method: Mix the sprite with the raspberry rum in a highball glass filled with ice.  Stir, then add a squeeze of lime.

real-colorado-bulldog.method: Fill a highball glass with ice.  Add Kahlua, Vodka, Cola, and fill with half and half.  Stir well.  Can also replace Kahlua with Amaretto.  Very tasty!

red-beer.method: Pour ingredients into Mason Jar and drink.

red-bull-n-malibu.method: Pour Malibu over ice and add Red Bull.

red-death.method: Mix ingredients together and pour into shot glasses.

red-death-2.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

red-devil.method: Mix alcohols, fill with orange juice.

red-hurricane.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Stir before serving.

red-lotus.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a martini glass and garnish with maraschino cherries.

red-passion-lemonade.method: Blend ingredients into a shaker. Shake and pour into an ice filled highball glass.

red-sea.method: Mix ingredients in a highball glass with ice.

red-snapper.method: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into glass over ice.

redheaded-slut.method: Fill tumbler a quarter of the way with ice. Add ingredients and ask woman with big breasts to shake. Pour into two large shot glasses.

redheaded-slut-2.method: Add liquors to a jar, fill with cranberry juice and top with a splash of OJ.

release-valve.method: Shake ingredients briefly. Serve in Collins Glass filled with ice.  Garnish with a cherry.

ritz-fizz.method: Make sure your champagne is chilled.  Fill a champagne flute about 3/4 full, then add the rest of the ingredients.  Garnish with the twist of lemon.

rock-lobster.method: Mix the Crown and Raspberry Schnapps, top off with the cranberry juice, stir...

rocky-mountain-bear-fucker.method: Pour 3/4 of an oz. of Tequila, then 3/4 of an oz. of J.D., then top off with 151.

roman-coffee.method:
Squeeze a lemon wedge inside an Irish coffee mug, and wipe the juice all around the sides of the glass using the wedge.  Empty excess juice. Next add the sugar and rotate the glass until the sugar completely covers the inside of the glass. Add the Galliano and set it alight so that it caramelizes the sugar; (keep the glass rotating to avoid it cracking from uneven heating.... done properly you can even use a thin crystal 'tulip glass' safely). Once the sugar has started to caramelize, add strong black coffee, top it up with the whipped cream, add the cinnamon and freshly ground nutmeg.  Serve immediately.

Tip: Warm the Galliano first, it'll be easier to set alight.

rootbeer-float-3.method: Top off the rootbeer schnapps with the Bailey's!

rosarios-red.method: Add raspberry vodka to ice-filled glass.  Fill 3/4 with 7-up, then the rest with cranberry juice.  Stir lightly.

royal-fuck.method: Shake with ice and pour into a glass with ice.

ruby-relaxer.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

rum-and-coke.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Garnish with a lemon wedge.

rum-flare.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

rum-fuzzy-navel.method: Measure a highball glass full of ice cubes into a cocktail shaker.  Add ingredients and shake well.  Pour back into highball glass.

rum-punch.method: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.  Stir before serving.

rum-screwdriver.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

rummy-delight.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a highball glass over ice and garnish with an orange.

rumpled-feathers.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

russian-christmas.method: Mix Kahlua and vodka as if making a White Russian. Add in eggnog and stir.

russian-jack.method: Add Vodka and Jack Daniel's to an equal amount of sour mix, shake over ice, pour into a Collins glass.  Enjoy!

russian-qualude.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into shot glasses.

russian-turkey.method: Combine ingredients with a few ice cubes in a rocks glass.

rusty-nail.method: Build over ice in a rocks glass. Stir, and garnish with a lemon twist.

salty-balls.method: Salt the rim of a collins glass and fill with ice.  Add vodka and orange juice, then fill with grapefruit juice.  Layer melon liqueur on top.

salty-chihuahua.method: Rim a tall glass with salt and fill it with ice.  Add tequila and fill with grapefruit juice.  Garnish with a pink grapefruit wheel.

salty-dog.method: Salt the rim of a highball glass and fill it with ice. Add ingredients and stir well.

sandy-beach.method: Fill a collins glass with ice.  Add coconut rum, and fill with equal parts of orange juice and pineapple juice.  Top with a splash of grenadine.

sangria.method: Cut fruit into small to medium size pieces.  Combine wine, juices and fruit in a pitcher.  Add brandy (or substitute cointreau) and vodka.  Stir and finish with a splash of ginger ale.  Serve chilled.

Wine, red.quantity: 2 bottles (Gamay, Pinot Noir or Cabernet Franc)

sangria-the-destroyer.method: Combine all ingredients, except the soda in a pitcher and chill completely.  Sangria should age in the refrigerator for at least 24 hours in order to allow the flavors to develop.  Before serving add the club soda.  Pour over ice into a highball or pint class. Garnish with fresh fruit.

santa-claus-is-coming.method: Use a large shot glass.  Layer ingredients and top with whipped cream (the "snow").

santorum.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass. Make sure it's frothy.

scooby-shooter.method: Add everything to a shaker, shake and serve as shots.

scooby-snack.method: In a shaker, with a scoop of ice, mix all ingredients, strain into shot glass, and enjoy.

scooby-snack-2.method: Shake everything in a shaker. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. No ice.

scooby-snack-4.method: In a shaker, with a scoop of ice, mix all ingredients and strain into shot glass.

scorpion-bowl.method: Fill pitcher with about 10 oz. of ice. Add liqueurs. Mix in juice, top with grenadine and then stir well.  Makes enough for 2-5 people.

scotch-and-ginger-ale.method: Fill glass with ice.  Pour 1.5 oz. Scotch over ice.  Top off with ginger ale.

scotch-and-water.method: Build over ice cubes in a highball glass.

screaming-nazi.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

screaming-orgasm.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into an old fashioned glass or into shooters.  Garnish with a cherry.

screaming-sex-with-the-bartender.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

screw-gin.method: Put ice into glass and pour in Gin and peach schnapps.  Fill with orange juice.  Stir and enjoy!

screw-gin-fizz.method: Put some ice cubes into glass.  Add Gin, Triple Sec, and then tonic water.  Fill with orange juice.  Stir.  Garnish with lime wedge.

screwdriver.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Garnish with an orange slice.

sea-breeze.method: Build into a highball glass with ice.  Garnish with a wedge of lime.

sea-monkey.method: Store the Goldschlager in the freezer for at least 4 hours beforehand.  When cold, layer Goldschlager over blue curacao in a shot glass.  The taste is quite unique and finishes with a strong wave of cinnamon.

serbian-guerilla-fighter.method: Yukon first, Kruskovac middle, Slivovica on top. Light, blow out, drink! No sipping allowed.

serendipity.method: Mix everything in a shaker, and serve over ice.

seven-deadly-sins.method: In a shaker, put all liquor over ice.  Measure even amounts of the Orange Juice, Papaya Juice, and Sour or 7up (depending on your tastes). Shake and pour into a 16 oz. pint glass, with the ice.  Garnish with oranges and cherries and a straw.

sex-in-a-jacuzzi.method: Mix the schnapps, vodka, cranberry juice, OJ, pineapple juice and sprite (on the rocks) splash some orange soda on the top.

sex-in-the-city.method: Mix ingredients together in a cocktail glass.

sex-in-the-forest.method: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add schnapps, rum, vodka and fill glass most of the way with 7-up. Roll Creme de Menthe quickly around the rim of the glass and splash with cream on top, garnish with 2 cherries.

sex-lies-video-poker.method: Shake everything together with ice, pour over ice cubes.  Garnish with cherry.

sex-on-malibu-beach.method: Pour liquors into glass, and top with OJ and cranberry juice, with a bit of grenadine.  It's yummy!

sex-on-the-bar.method: Build over ice in a hurricane glass.

sex-on-the-beach.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

sex-on-the-beach-2.method: Fill glass with ice, add Midori, then Malibu. Fill with Pineapple juice almost to the top, put a tiny bit of grenadine in and stir in a little cream. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

sex-on-the-beach-3.method: Combine coconut rum, peach schnapps, orange juice and grenadine in cocktail shaker with ice. Shake. Pour into tall glass with ice. Add cherry.

sex-on-the-beach-shooter.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into shot glasses.

sex-with-a-salamander.method: Mix Hpnotiq and sour mix in a shaker and pour into a glass.  Carefully add a layer of raspberry liqueur, then layer the Jagermeister on top.  Make in an old fashioned glass or martini glass for best effect.

sex-with-amanda.method: Mix all the ingredients in a glass, squeeze lime, add cherries, and add a straw.

sex-with-amy-is-good.method: Fill glass with cubed ice. Pour all ingredients into mixing tin, shake well and pour over ice into glass. Garnish with a swizzle stick and a straw.

sex-with-an-alligator.method: Layer drink into shot glass first using Chambord, then Midori. then Jagermeister.

sex-with-an-okinawan-bartender.method: Shake with ice, pour into glass and enjoy on the beach.

sex-with-jenny.method: Combine all ingredients except grenadine in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and add a dash of grenadine. Drink fast!

sex-with-kari.method: Mix orange juice and pineapple juice, then add the strawberry vodka and top off with sprite

sex-with-selena.method: Mix everything together into a Collin's glass.

sex-with-steven.method: Fill a collins glass with ice and add vodka and Midori.  Fill with 7-Up and stir.

sex-with-the-bartender.method: Mix everything together in glass with ice.

sex-with-the-manager.method: Fill the glass with ice, put in one shot of each Parrot Bay and a splash of Absolut Peach, fill with OJ, and top with cranberry juice and a splash of 7-up. Garnish with any colorful fruit, I use an orange and cherries.

sexy-alligator.method:
Put melon liqueur and sour into a mixing tin, and spindle-mix for two seconds. Pour contents into martini glass. Slowly pour Jagermeister down the side of the glass (it will sink to bottom). Carefully float raspberry liqueur on top of the melon-sour layer. If successful you should have a 3 layered drink! Upon finishing, you have had sex with an alligator.

Recommended: Chambord brand raspberry liqueur, Midori brand melon liqueur

sexy-fencer.method: Blend ingredients in a blender.  Garnish with an umbrella and drink with a bendy straw.

sexy-green-frogs.method: Fill a pitcher with ice add triple sec vodka and midori fill with 7up and stir. Serve in shot glasses!

sexy-stephy.method: Fill glass with ice.  Pour in 1 part Peach Schnapps with 2 parts raspberry flavored sparkling water, top with a splash of grenadine.  Give it a quick stir and enjoy!

shantini.method: Break out your martini shaker, pour in 1.5 ounces of vodka, 3.5 ounces of cranberry juice and a spoonful of frozen limade.  Shake it all about, pour, garnish with a lime slice and enjoy.

sherbet-suprise.method: Combine 7-up and vodka in a punch bowl.  Add sherbet

shit-on-the-grass.method: Layer Bailey's Irish Cream on top of Creme de Menthe.

shocking-cock-sucker.method: Mix all ingredients in blender except whipped cream. When done mixing top with whipped cream.

shot-in-the-dark.method: In a shot glass, layer Kahlua, then Irish cream, then vodka.  Serve.

shuddering-orgasm.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a highball glass.  Add ice if the drink is too strong for your taste.  Serve and enjoy!

sicko-dreamsicle.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Stir and garnish with an orange slice.

sidecar.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

sidecar-cocktail.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

silk-panties.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into a shot glasses.

simple-cocaine.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

singapore-sling.method: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry.

sledgehammer.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

slippery-nipple.method: Layer sambuca in a cocktail glass, then Bailey's Irish cream.  Add a drop of grenadine in the center.

slippery-nipple-shot.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

slippery-nipple-shot-2.method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into shot glasses.

slippery-nog.method: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.  Stir well before serving.

slow-comfortable-screw.method: Build over ice in a collins glass.

slow-comfortable-screw-up-against-the-be.method: Put all ingredients in a mixer with ice, except 151. Strain into an empty glass. Serve with straw, pour 151 down the straw. Warn drinker to suck the whole thing down in one go, or else they'll never finish it. It actually tastes pretty good.

slow-death.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

sludge.method: Mix everything in a pitcher with a few ice cubes.

snakebite.method: Combine ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker.  Mix and strain into highball glass over ice.

snow-bunny.method: Heat mug. Pour in hot chocolate, add Triple Sec and stir.  Top with whipped cream or marshmallows.  Sit by the fire place and enjoy.

snow-cone.method: Crush ice very fine - fill glass with crushed ice.  Place 1 oz of raspberry schnapps in the glass along with the 1/2 oz of grenadine.  Pour in 12 oz sprite.  Place 1 oz of blue curacao after adding the sprite.  Stir only a couple of times, you want the drink to stay multicolored.  Serve with a straw and bang, you have a snow cone.

soco-lime.method: It's best to prepare multiple shots at the same time. Start with a cup full of ice, add Southern Comfort until the cup is almost full. Then add lime juice as desired, mix and pour into shot glasses. Enjoy!

sour-apple-cosmopolitan.method: Shake everything together, strain into cocktail glass and garnish with an apple slice.

sour-apple-martini.method: In shaker, add all ingredients over small amount of ice.  Shake & strain into chilled martini glass.  Garnish with cherry in bottom of glass.

sour-appleball.method: Combine all ingredients (except Sprite) into a shaker half filled with ice.  Strain contents into a collins glass, then add Sprite.  Stir and enjoy!

sour-jack.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

southern-dew.method: Pour Mountain Dew into glass over ice and add Southern Comfort.

southern-long-island-tea.method: Pour all the liquors in a high ball glass filled with ice then add a splash of cola and top with orange juice.  It will be the same color as tea.

southern-love.method: Put a few ice cubes into the glass, then stir in the rest of the ingredients.

southern-sex.method:
Put lemon twist into glass and pour in liquids. Don't mix it too much, it'll slowly mix itself, but it looks great to serve - dark at the bottom, light at the top.
Really refreshing and easy to make!

southern-sunrise.method: Mix Southern Comfort and orange juice in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Pour into glass and layer a splash of grenadine on top.  Garnish with an orange slice and a sprig of mint.

southern-sunshine.method: Combine fruit juices and sugar in a 32 oz. pitcher. Stir until sugar dissolves. Add remaining ingredients and ice. Makes four 6-oz. servings.

spanish-milk.method:
Put all ingredients into a blender and mix for a few seconds until smooth (or use crushed ice and shake well in a shaker). Pour into a chilled old fashioned glass and strew some cinnamon on top (using a template for nice shapes).

Note: Instead of sugar, a scoop of vanilla ice also blends well with the aroma of cuerenta y tres.

spider-man.method: Add grenadine to a hurricane glass, then fill with ice.  Add vodka and fill with 7-up.  Splash blue curacao on top and garnish with a cherry.

spring-box.method: Layer Bailey's Irish Cream on top of Creme de Menthe.

squinting-daedelus.method: Blend tequila, triple sec, orange (peeled and sectioned), and sour mix with ice until smooth.  Salt the rim of the glass and serve with a lime garnish.

starry-night-shot.method: Fill a shot glass 2/3 of the way with Jagermeister.  Fill the rest with Goldschlager. Looks like a Starry Night.

starseeker.method: Build over ice cubes in a highball glass.  Stir and garnish with a lemon wedge.

stock-market-crash.method: Mix one shot of Goldschlager with one shot of 151-proof rum in a double shot glass.  Pour Coke into a beer mug to a height above the height of the shot glass.  Ignite the contents of the shot glass and then drop it into the glass with the Coke.

stormin-samoan.method: Dip rim of glass in lime juice.  Then dip rim in sugar.  Mix all ingredients except for grenadine in shaker with ice.  Strain into glass and then drop grenadine from spoon into the center of the drink.

strawberries-and-cream.method: Blend everything except one berry with 2 cups crushed ice, until smooth. Serve in a parfait glass with a straw and the last berry as garnish.

strawberry-daiquiri.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

strawberry-margarita.method: Salt a cocktail glass rim by rubbing it with lemon juice and putting it in salt.  Add everything but salt to a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake and strain into glass.

strawberry-shiver.method: Boil two cups of hot water, add strawberry jello mix. Stir well. Then whisk in one cup of Tequila Rose, and stir well. Pour into icecube trays or plastic shot cups. Then put into fridge until set.

strawberry-stripper.method: Build over ice in a collins glass.  Stir.

strip-and-go-naked-punch.method: Combine ingredients with a bag of ice in a punch bowl.

suffering-bastard.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a highball glass.

summer-brew.method: Empty one can of frozen Lime-Aide into a pitcher with 3 handfuls of ice.  Fill empty can with vodka and put into pitcher. Add 4 bottles of beer and stir.  Serve in frosty beer mug.

sunset-in-a-glass.method: Mix all ingredients together adding the champagne last. Shake over ice and pour into a champagne flute. Enjoy!

superman.method: Fill glass with ice, add equal parts rum, peach schnapps and triple sec. Fill with pineapple juice, stir. Top with grenadine.

superman-ice-cream-shooter.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a shot glass.

surf-city-slammers.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

surfer-on-acid.method: Shake with ice and strain into shot glasses.  (For a batch, use 4 parts rum, 3 parts Jagermeister, 5 parts pineapple juice.)

swedish-fish.method: Shake everything with ice and strain into shot glasses.

sweet-afternoon.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

sweet-candy-apple.method: Build over ice in a plastic cup.  Garnish with a slice of lime.

sweet-melissa.method: Add rum and vodka to a hurricane glass full of ice.  Fill with desired amount of pineapple and orange juice, topping with a splash of cranberry.  Squeeze a lime wedge over it and then drop it in.

sweet-sex.method: Fill glass with ice.  Pour 1 oz. each of the 5 liquors.  Put about 3 drops of grenadine and fill the remaining part of the glass with orange juice.  Shake well and drink up!!

sweet-shit.method: Combine ingredients and stir until syrup is fully dissolved. Pour into cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake and pour into glass.

sweet-tart.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

tacomancer.method: Combine espresso and peach schnapps in a large mason jar.  Fill with Dr. Pepper and stir.

tangerine-tito.method: Combine ingredients in a plastic cup over ice.

tanqueray-and-tonic.method: Build over ice in a rocks glass.  Garnish with a slice of lime.

tequila-body-slammer.method: Pour a shot of tequila.  Place a couple dashes of salt somewhere on someone else's body.  Lick the salt, shoot the tequila and suck the lemon in quick succession.

tequila-poppers.method: Add half tequila, half 7-Up to a shot glass.  Put your hand (or a napkin) over the top, pick it up and slam it on the table.  Drink quickly while it bubbles!

tequila-shots.method: Pour a shot of tequila.  Lick your hand between your thumb and your forefinger, and cover the wet spot with some salt.  Lick the salt, shoot the tequila and suck on the lime in quick succession.

tequila-slammer.method: Add half tequila, half 7-Up to a shot glass.  Put your hand (or a napkin) over the top, pick it up and slam it on the table.  Drink quickly while it bubbles!

tequila-sunrise.method: Add orange juice and tequila to a highball glass filled with ice. Splash grenadine on top, garnish with an orange slice and a cherry and a straw.  Do not stir.

terminator.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

texas-antifreeze.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

texas-tea.method: Fill a pitcher with ice and add all ingredients.  Add cola last, and stir thoroughly before adding.  Stir again before serving.

th-special.method: Pour over ice into a snifter, swirl a few times, sip repeatedly.

that-time-of-the-month.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

the-berserker.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

the-big-dinky-drinky.method:
This is for your bachelorette party and other crazy girls!  

You'll have to cut about 2 inches off the banana (six inches usually works well).  Use something to pierce a hole through the center of the banana, the long way (a chopstick works well).  Then, freeze the banana.  When served, simply place the banana into the glass and you have a really fun straw.  Be careful though, cause this can get pretty messy real quick. Have a towel or napkin ready. You can really use this with many different drinks.  Also, whipped cream can be used to top it off!

the-bomb-pop-2.method: Pour sour mix and vodka into cocktail shaker over ice. Pour into two 1-ounce shot glass. Layer first the Blue Curacao then the Raspberry liqueur.

the-bomb-pop-3.method: Fill a collins glass with ice.  Pour in lemonade and rum.  Add grenadine so it sinks to the bottom.  Add UV Blue across the ice so it layers on top.

the-brain.method: In double shot glass, add vodka and kahlua. Drop Irish Cream in the center. This should appear as a floating brain in your drink.

the-centurion.method:
Possibly the true test of manhood.
Drink a shot of beer.  Repeat once every minute for the next 100 minutes.

the-cheap-date.method: Mix the Rum Schanpps and Triple Sec, add 2 cubes of ice, then fill glass with Apple Juice, let chill for 5 minutes, then enjoy!

the-dudes-white-russian.method: Add ice, vodka, and Kahlua. Fill to the top with cream. Transfer to a shaker then back into the glass for a good mix.

the-friend-john.method: Stir ingredients into highball glass and serve.  Best if orange juice and vodka are chilled.

the-funny-fist.method:
Perform the modern Absinthe ritual using a beer mug.  Add the vodka (make sure the flames are out), then fill with Sprite and add ice cubes.  Add the caramel syrup and vodka.

See http://www.drinknation.com/bartending/absinthe-ritual.php
for more information on the Absinthe Ritual.

the-ginfather.method: Combine gin and amaretto in and old fashioned glass and mix over ice.

the-graduate.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a shot glass.

the-lunch-box.method: Combine beer and orange juice in a beer mug.  Drop in a 1 oz. shot glass full of Amaretto and drink quickly.

the-mighty-rct.method: Fill tall glass with ice cubes, add dark rum, then top up the glass almost full with cranberry juice. Finally add shot of triple sec, and give a quick stir to mix.

the-mighty-vodka-cranbull.method: Discovered by Dj Moka and championed by djmischiff. Start with ice, add vodka, toss in a bottlefull of Red Bull (it gives you wings) and top it off with cranberry juice.

the-mummy.method: Build over ice in a rocks glass.  Stir well.

the-ol-midori-sour.method: Fill a rocks glass halfway with ice. Take all ingredients and shake, also with ice. Strain into glass. Infinitely better than the "sour mix" version of this drink.

the-patriot.method: This is a layered shot, with the end result being a layer of red, then white and blue.  Fill the shot 1/3 of the way with grenadine.  Using the back of a spoon (bar spoon if you have one), pour in the white creme de cacao.  Use the same technique to fill the final 1/3 with blue curacao.  Enjoy the effect.

the-real-porn-star.method: Fill a beer mug full of vodka.

the-roog.method: Start by putting one and a half shots of Everclear in the bottom of your cup. Fill the cup three quarters of the way full with orange juice. Fill the rest with cranberry juice. Add ice if desired.  Do not stir as this will make it so that all you taste is the Everclear.  This gives you The Roog!

the-shaved-beaver.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

the-texans.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

the-wizard-of-booze.method: Pour shots into a hurricane glass or any tall glass.  Add ice and fill with margarita mix.

thin-mint.method: Pour a half shot of Bailey's Irish Cream, then add chocolate syrup to your preference. Add one half shot of Creme de Menthe, stir well, and enjoy!

third-term-abortion.method: Fill shot glass w/ peach schnapps. Dash Kaluha and Grenadine together so that they sink together into the bottom of the shot glass.

three-wise-men.method: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

three-wise-men-2.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

three-wise-men-go-hunting.method: Add Jack Daniel's, Jim Beam, Scotch whiskey and Wild Turkey in that order to a shot glass.

threesome.method: Rim three shot glasses with Aquavit and sugar.  Add absinthe and Aquavit to the first shot glass, tequila and grenadine to the second, and Galliano and Bailey's to the third.  Light the first glass on fire and serve.  Drink in the Threesome from the flaming foreplay to the sweet'n'milky finish!

throw-me-down-and-fuck-me-hard.method: Put all the ingredients in a tall glass, mix well. Tastes best if ingredients are chilled first.

thunderbolt.method: Shake everything with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

tic-tac.method: Put equal parts of ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Mix and pour into a shot glass.

tirasmoothie.method: Put all ingredients except for whipped cream into blender and mix until smooth. Pour into glass, then top with whipped cream.

tirimisu.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass. Sprinkle chocolate shavings on top as a garnish.

tlc.method: Pour rum over ice, and add the iced tea. A slice of lemon make a nice touch.

tntea.method: Put lemon in bottom of glass, add ice on top, then pour ingredients into glass.

toasted-almond.method: Build over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

toblerone.method:
Twirl honey and chocolate around the inside of the glass.
Blend all other ingredients in a blender and pour into the glass.

tokyo-tea-2.method: Build drink in tall glass with ice. Add clear liquors first. Fill with sour mix then add 1/4 oz. of Midori for color. Top with a cherry or two.

tom-collins.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a collins glass with ice and garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

tongue-in-my-panties.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

tootsie-roll.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

totally-twisted-dirty-bong-water.method: Mix and in a pitcher with a generous portion of ice.  Best served as ice cold as possible.

totem-pole.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

transfusion.method: Build over ice in a hurricane glass.

tricky.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.  Stir.

tropical-fuckin-fruit-thing.method: Mix all ingredients in a large punch bowl. Serve in highball glasses over cubed ice.

tropical-hooter.method: Mix ingredients over ice in glass. Shake if preferred.

tropical-island-itch.method: Build over ice and garnish with a slice of ripe mango.  Stir and enjoy!

tucker-death-mix.method: Put 3/4 of a 20 oz. bottle of Gatorade in first, then pour in the Everclear, I recomended 1 1/2 shots of it, but use as much as you dare.  Then finish with 1 can of Red Bull.  Stir until mixed well and enjoy.

tweakin-puerto-rican.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

twisted-delight.method: Mix all ingredients in glass with ice.

ugly.method:
Fill a mug 3/4 full with beer.  Slowly fill the rest with tomato juice by pouring it down the side so it settles on the bottom.  Toss a couple of pinches of salt into the mug and wait for the drink to foam up.
Then chug the whole thing down, slam it on the table and  yell "Ugly!".

ultimate-chocolate-raspberry-martini.method: Squirt about a tablespoon of chocolate syrup inside and around the rim of a cocktail glass.  Shake all other ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice, and strain into glass.

ultimate-june-bug.method: Shake all ingredients together and pour over ice.

ultimate-pina-colada.method: In a blender: 1 1/2oz Bacardi, Coco Lopez, Pineapple juice - Add ice and blend to a somewhat thick texture. Pour 1/2 mixture into Hurricane glass. Pour in Strawberry mixture (use a cocktail spoon to slide some of the strawberry mixture down sides). Add remaining Pina Colada mix, top with Whipped Cream and a Cherry / or optional and very nice: a fanned strawberry.

ultimate-screaming-nazi.method: Pour equal parts into a double shot glass and slam it!

ultramarine.method: Put a shot of blue curacao in a champagne flute, fill with champagne and top with a grape.

unabomber.method: Shake all ingredients together, strain into shot glasses.

upside-down-pineapple.method: Shake vanilla vodka and pineapple juice with ice and strain into shot glass.  Add grenadine.  The grenadine will sink to the bottom and will give this shot a very sweet conclusion.

vaitkus.method: Shake everything together and pour into a cocktail glass.

vampire.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

vanilla-43.method: Shake ingrediants with ice and strain into martini glass.

vanilla-coke-2.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

vanilla-rum-n-coke.method: Build over ice in a highball glass. Nice twist to the regular rum and coke.

vanilla-russian.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

vegan-milk.method: In a Collins or highball glass, stir Bailey's, Frangelico and Kahlua with ice.  Add unflavored soy milk to taste.  Enjoy!

velvet-hammer.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

veritas-asshat.method: Fill glass with ice, add 2 shots of rum then 2 shots of midori then 2 splashes of sour mix and then fill to top of glass with sprite. Stir with straw and enjoy!

very-berry-tonic.method: Fill collins glass with ice. Add the vodka & the raspberry liqueur. Fill with tonic and garnish with a few fresh raspberries.

vesper.method:
Shake everything with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.  Garnish with a lemon twist, and run it around the edge of the glass.

This is the martini ordered by James Bond in Ian Fleming's novel, Casino Royale.  Bond tells the bartender, "Three measures of Gordon's, one of vodka, half a measure of Kina Lillet. Shake it very well until it's ice-cold, then add a large thin slice of lemon peel. Got it?"

Kina Lillet is no longer available, and is generally replaced with Lillet Blanc for a modern Vesper cocktail.

viagra-shot.method: Shake everything with ice; strain into a cordial glass.

vibrator.method: Layer Bailey's Irish Cream and Southern Comfort in a Pousse Cafe glass.

vietnam-acid-flash-back.method: Simply mix in glass over ice, give a short shake, and garnish with a cherry and an orange...

violent-sex.method: Add white curacao and sloe gin to the glass, and then fill up half with OJ and the other half with sour mix.

vodka-and-cranberry.method: Shake ingredients together with ice and pour into a highball glass over ice.

vodka-and-lemonade.method: Shake everything together with ice; pour into a highball glass with ice.

vodka-and-tonic.method: Shake everything together with ice; pour into a highball glass with ice.

vodka-gimlet.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

vodka-martini.method: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Squeeze the oil from a lemon peel onto the drink.  Optionally garnish with a green cocktail olive.

vodka-orange.method:
Mix vodka and fresh squeezed OJ in a 1:2 ratio.
Note that this recipe is a stronger version of the screwdriver and is served in a cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry if desired.

vodka-volcano.method: Shake everything except grenadine with ice, and pour into a highball glass half full of ice cubes. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink, making a red trail down through the ice.

vomit-juice.method: Add whiskey first otherwise you can taste it the whole way through the drink.  Then add the vodka and tequila.  Pour in the bottle of Smirnoff Ice and top up with 1 shot of red and 1 shot of blue Aftershock. Finish with a can of Red Bull.

voodoo-sunrise.method: Shake everything but the grenadine with ice and strain into the glass. Tilt the glass and rotate it while slowly adding the grenadine by pouring it down the inside of the glass.

waborita.method: In a shaker add fresh ice, limes, cointreau, tequila and damiana. Shake, and pour into frozen salt-rimmed cocktail glasses. Splash in the curacao and serve.

waikiki-beachcomber.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

walk-me-down.method: Shake all ingredients except 7-up in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice.  Fill with 7-up.

wanna-fuck.method: Mix ingredients and then pour into cocktail glass.

washington-apple.method: Mix apple pucker and Crown Royal and fill with Apple-cranberry juice. Mix well serve with ice.

washington-apple-shot.method: Add apple pucker and Crown Royal to a shot glass, then add a splash of cranberry juice on top.

washington-red-apple.method: Fill glass half full with ice, add ingredients to glass.

water-moccasin.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

watercolour.method: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.  Garnish with a cherry.

watermelon-jolly-rancher.method: Add a shot of vodka, then add the cranberry and 7-up in a 3:1 ratio.

weakness.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

webbies-wonder.method: Fill a glass with ice and pour the ingredients into it.

wedding-cake-martini.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass, top with a cherry.

weskarini-perfect.method: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry. Serve.

weskarini-sweet.method: Shake all ingredients except cherry with ice. Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry, serve.

wet-pussy.method: Pour buttershot into shot glass then float a small amount of tequila rose on top of it.

wet-pussy-2.method: Mix the liqours together and then add the juices to taste. Add more juices to remove the flavor of the alcohol.

wet-vagina.method: Pour Jack Daniels and vodka into glass. Fill with coke.

whiskey-sour.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a sour glass and garnish with a half orange slice and a cherry.

whiskey-swerve.method: Build over ice in a highball glass.

white-almond-kiss.method: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass...yum!

white-christmas.method: Shake with ice, strain into a snifter.  Sprinkle chocolate flakes on top.

white-christmas-2.method: Shake with shaved ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.  Garnish with a candy cane.  Enjoy.

white-hazelnut-martini.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.  Garnish with 1-2 dashes of cocoa powder.

white-pirate.method: Mix together in a glass and enjoy.

white-russian.method: Pour coffee liqueur and vodka into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Float the cream on top and stir slowly.

white-witch.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into shot glasses.

whos-the-boss.method: Chill the vodka, rum and pucker.  Mix in large quantities with ice.

why-santa-has-a-naughty-list.method: Add gin and amaretto to a collins glass filled with ice.  Fill almost full with sprite.  Add grenadine slowly, then layer banana liqueur on top.

wild-child.method: Add everything into a shot glass.

wild-fling.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

wild-sex.method: Shake everything (except grenadine) with ice.  Pour into a hurricane glass with some ice, splash a bit of grenadine over the ice.

wild-wet-dream.method: Add equal parts of alcohol over ice and fill glass with cranberry juice.

wildfire.method: In a shot glass, layer the ingredients in the following order: grenadine, melon liqueur, Island Blue Pucker, Hypnotiq, and top w/ Bacardi 151. Looks pretty killer - timely, but worth it. Then, pour half a can of Red Bull into a 12 oz glass.  Light the shot on fire, drop into the glass of Red Bull and chug! Very tasty! Enjoy and be safe!

will-rogers.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a cocktail glass.

willie-the-wildcat.method: Combine ingredients in a highball glass.

windex.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a highball glass.

windex-2.method: Pour them both into a shot glass and shoot.

winter-white-russian.method: Put ice cream, Kahlua, (or you can substitute Kamora), Vodka and about 4 or 5 ice cubes - depending on how thick you like you frozen drinks. Blend together in blender, and enjoy. Repeat procedure when botton of glass appears.

wisconsin-lunchbucket.method: Combine beer and orange juice in a beer mug.  Drop in a 1 oz. shot glass full of Amaretto and drink quickly.

wonderful-dream.method:
Combine ingredients (except lemon and banana) in shaker and shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish the glass with the lemon wedge and add a few banana slices to the drink.
Serve with a straw.

woo-woo.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a highball glass over ice.

woo-woo-shooter.method: Pour 1/2 oz. vodka, then 1/2 oz. peach schnapps in shot glass, top off with 1/2 oz. cranberry juice.

wootastic.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

worlds-best-pina-colada.method: Blend ingredients in a bar blender, adding ice until a granular icy mixture is reached.  Serve in a hurricane glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge.

worlds-best-strawberry-banana-smoothie.method: Put the peeled banana, orange juice and orange rum in the blender.  Blend at high speeds until smooth. Add 5 frozen strawberries, banana and melon liqueurs.  Blend at high speeds until smooth again, then add in the cream, blend some more.  Pour into glasses.

wouldnt-you-like-to-have-sex-with-the-ba.method: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

wrigleys-juicy-fruit.method: Place ingredients in a shaker. Shake, then pour into a shot glass.  Enjoy.

yale-cocktail.method: Shake everything with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

yellow-bird.method: Shake everything with ice and pour into highball glass.

yoda.method: Mix everything together in a shaker; pour over ice in a collins glass.

yukka.method: Pour 1/2 gallon of Absolut into large punch bowl.  Squeeze lemons and limes into vodka, add sugar and stir. Tastes just like lemonade.

yukon-snakebite.method: Put Yukon Jack in shot glass and add splash of lime juice.

zombie.method: Shake everything except the 151 rum in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into a collins glass over ice and float the 151 on top.  Garnish with a cherry.

zombie-2.method: Blend all ingredients except overproof rum in a blender with ice. Pour into a double highball glass full of ice. Add the 151 on top, and use a pineapple slice, a lime slice and a mint sprig for garnish.
